key.name: 喂，$MyPCName$！ 觐见仪式被取消的消息你听到了吗？
看来和我一样……啊，真是的！！越想越气人。 地震已经是几天前的事了，为什么到现在才 取消觐见仪式呢？
一定有什么阴谋。我闻到了阴谋的味道！ 我一定要查清楚，他们到底在掩盖什么。
问有没有查到什么。
那……那个……嗯，我还在四处打听！ 总之！接下去我会很忙，有什么问题的话，你可以去 那边问$npcTitle:11000169[gender:0]$～
我想知道的就是<font color="#ffd200">觐见仪式取消的理由</font>。 地震也过了好几天了，为什么现在突然取消觐见仪式？ 啊，真是的！越想越生气……
一定有什么阴谋。我闻到了阴谋的味道！ 我一定要查清楚，他们到底在掩盖什么。
我现在需要到处打听消息。 所以你也好好去到处问问， 有什么消息就告诉我，知道了吗？嗯？
请你告诉我问谁比较好。
嗯？这……这你为什么要问我？！ 你不知道就从附近开始问啊！ 你可以问问那边的$npcTitle:11000169[gender:0]$啊～
我很忙…… 想知道觐见仪式为什么取消的话，可以去问那边的 武器库警卫兵！
嗯？刚才你说啥？
问知不知道觐见仪式取消的真正原因。
啊……那……那个…… 这个嘛……
我也不知道觐见仪式取消是否另有原因…… 与其来问我这样的普通近卫兵，不如去问 $map:02000140$的$npc:11000492[gender:0]$。
$npc:11000492[gender:0]$是谁啊？
他是负责王室日常起居的王室管理员。 这次觐见仪式的准备活动由他管理。关于觐见仪式取消的原因， 他一定知道得更多。
我也不知道觐见仪式取消是否另有原因…… 与其来问我这样的普通近卫兵，不如去问 $map:02000140$的$npc:11000492[gender:0]$。
唉…… 你是来找我的？有什么事吗？
问知不知道觐见仪式取消的真正原因。
啊……$MyPCName$，你也是为了这个来找我的啊。 首先，就结论而言……因为来看觐见仪式的人太多， <font color="#ffd200">无法保证安全，因此才不得已取消了活动</font>。
当然我也知道，由于取消得太仓促，很多从远方赶来的 人一定会非常失望。 但王室也不能冒着巨大的危险，坚持进行仪式。 这一点希望你能理解。
到底有什么危险。
啊……不久前发生的<font color="#ffd200">地震是最大的危险因素</font>。 $map:02000001$附近还是第一次发生这么强的地震， 现在原因还没有查明。
如果在举行觐见仪式的过程中发生地震，就会发生 无法挽回的情况，不是吗？ 总之，你不远万里来参加觐见仪式，<font color="#ffd200">作为觐见仪式准备工作的 负责人，我代表王室向你道歉</font>。
<font color="#ffd200">做出这个决定是为了所有人的安全</font>。 希望你能体谅王室的立场。谢谢。
喂，年轻人。 你也是在前去参加觐见仪式的过程中，听说了仪式取消的消息，就来这里了？
说是。
果然是这样…… 我也是背着这么沉重的行李，绕了很远的路，才来到了这里。 听说觐见仪式突然取消了。我非常生气，想过来问问情况。
啊，但是$npc:11000492[gender:0]$耐心地跟我解释王室的立场， 跟我赔礼道歉，现在心里感觉好多了。 很多在行脚商人都说<font color="#ffd200">特莱雅王室管理员 为人正直，对他赞不绝口</font>，果然名不虚传啊。
因为觐见仪式突然被取消，估计有很多人像我们一样生气。 但他却能一直保持微笑，平静地解释事情的来龙去脉…… 而且还给我介绍了货源，让我可以在觐见仪式现场 卖东西……世界上哪有这样的好人啊。
啊，不知不觉又扯远了。现在不是说这些的时候…… 要想在太阳下山之前赶到$npc:11000492[gender:0]$介绍的交易处， 现在得马上出发。啊……但是这个该怎么办呢…… 不好意思，能请你帮个忙吗？
问是什么事。
我现在没时间回住处去退房了。 我把钥匙给你，你能到$map:02000033$去交给$npc:11000390[gender:0]$， 帮我把房给退了吗？
怎么又回来了？
说走错路了。
哎呀……差点白跑一趟。 来，给你。一定要放好。
你这么年轻，怎么就开始健忘了呢？ 刚才你不是放进背包了吗？在背包里好好找找！
哎呀……你的背包已经满了。 你先整理一下吧。
哎呀……最近的年轻人怎么比我还糊涂。
欢迎光临！有什么可以帮你吗？
把$npc:11000179[gender:0]$给的钥匙交出去，表示要退房。
原则上来说，必须本人亲自来退房才行……不过既然已经走了…… 那就没办法了。 知道觐见仪式已经取消的客人要求退房，还不知道已经取消的客人 还在赶过来要房，我都要忙死了。
在等待觐见仪式的时候，虽然很忙，但总觉得心情很激动。 但是现在……只剩下失望和忙碌。
哦……是刚才那位啊。 $npc:11000492[gender:0]$把觐见仪式取消的理由告诉你了吗？
转述从$npc:11000492[gender:0]$那里所听到的话。
啊……原来是这样…… 既然$npc:11000492[gender:0]$这么说，那一定没错。 他是不会骗人的……唉…… 要是觐见仪式没有取消的话……就不会有这种事了……
问是否有什么烦恼。
啊，那个……小偷……！ 呃……不，没什么。 跟不熟悉的人说这些干嘛……
说如果说明情况，可以帮助他。
嗯……那个……其实…… <font color="#ffd200">武器库中的武器全部不见了。</font> 觐见仪式取消之后，本打算在活动时使用的新武器 全都被存放在了这个武器库里……
我几乎从来没有离开，锁也锁得好好的…… 不知道是什么时候出的事。 要是武器被盗的事情泄露出去，我一定会被赶出近卫队……
你能帮我悄悄地把被盗的武器找回来吗？ 听说<font color="#ffd200">最近特莱雅的商人之间在交易赃物……</font> 其中可能混有<font color="#ffd200">被盗的武器</font>。
在$map:02000001$武器交易量最大的是<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000004[gender:0]$</font>。 你去找他，悄悄地打听一下可以吗？
在$map:02000001$武器交易量最大的是<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000004[gender:0]$</font>。 你去找他，悄悄地打听一下可以吗？
有什么问题吗？ 除了武器，我知道的并不多。
问最近交易的武器中有没有怀疑是赃物的武器。
你问这个干什么？ 我只卖自己制作的武器。 除了武器材料铁矿石之外，我不卖其他人做的武器。
<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000170[gender:0]$说愿意把铁矿石便宜卖给我， 我才从他那里买了点铁矿石。这是我最近做过的唯一一笔生意。</font>
干嘛总来烦我？
你卖给$npc:11000004[gender:0]$的铁矿石是赃物吗？
赃……赃物……你可别冤枉好人。 我只是……因为有人愿意低价出售铁矿石…… 我可是花钱买来，再卖给商人们的。
问铁矿石是从谁那里购买的。
那……那个…… 好像不太方便说……
说服雷塔讲出实情。
威逼雷塔讲出实情。
唉……事实上…… 我在路过$map:02000083$的时候，捡到了<font color="#ffd200">急售铁矿石</font>的 广告传单。
我刚好要到$map:02000001$来，所以觉得是个好机会。 因为制作近卫队员使用的盾牌和武器时，铁矿石是必不可少的材料。 所以在$map:02000001$可以卖出更好的价钱。
总之……我按照广告传单上的内容，来到了<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000141$</font>入口处。 拿出传单之后，他们就把我带到了<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000173[gender:0]$</font>面前。 虽然感觉有点阴森…… 但是我又不能直接转身走人。
那时我不知道，直到来到$map:02000001$， 我才知道<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000173[gender:0]$是臭名昭著的销赃者</font>。 我可以对天发誓，一开始交易的时候，我并不知道那是赃物。
再次确认购买铁矿石的地方。
是在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000141$</font>…… 只要进入<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000083$</font>高层建筑之间就行了。 给……只要把<font color="#ffd200">急售铁矿石</font>传单给他们看， 他们就会让你进去。
千万别说是我告诉你的。 要是被他们知道，一定不会放过我。明白了吗？
知道了，知道了……我也是第一次，而且又不知道那是赃物。 我只是经过<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000083$</font>的时候偶然看到了<font color="#ffd200">急售铁矿石</font>的广告传单， 才去找<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000173[gender:0]$</font>的。
来到$map:02000001$之后，我才听说<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000173[gender:0]$是臭名昭著的销赃者</font>。 一开始我绝对不知道那是赃物。
你是在哪里见到$npc:11000173[gender:0]$的？
怎……怎么又来了……
说走错路了。
啊……没错…… 就是这里！
刚才不是放进背包了吗？ 请再仔细找找。
你的背包好像太重了…… 能稍微整理一下吗？
啊……你又……吓死我了。
嘿～！喂～！ 你要去哪儿？
拿出广告传单，说要去$map:02000141$。
嘿～伙计～！ 你来晚了。铁矿石已经全卖光了～
$map:02000141$现在只有掮客组织成员才能进去～ 你还是回家睡觉吧～药～！呵呵。
对了！我得把铁矿石交易明细给你。 让我看看……
嗯……海娜……$npcName:11000492[gender:0]$……埃尔坎托……吉姆斯…… $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$……布尔托…… $npc:11000171[gender:0]$……嗯？啊哈……
<font color="#ffd200"> O月XX日/$npc:11000171[gender:0]$/铁矿石300公斤</font> 你要找的记录在这里！ $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$是$map:02000084$的旧货商头目。
拿着这个到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000084$</font>去追问<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000171[gender:0]$</font>， 就能知道你想要知道的事情。 我也得原路返回才行，有缘再见吧！
嘘！还没走吗？
说走错路了。
怎么这么不注意？这样下去的话，连我都会被发现。 给，拿着，赶紧离开这里。
刚才你好像放进背包了……没有吗？ 仔细找找看。
你怎么背了这么多东西？ 最好先整理一下，不然小心被人抢走。
这里确实有点复杂。 不要走错路，沿着走廊出去。
干嘛！ 不是来卖东西的话，就别在我面前晃悠。
把铁矿石交易文件给他看。
这……这是什么……你……你是从哪儿…… 你拿着它来找我干什么？
你卖给$npc:11000173[gender:0]$的铁矿石是从哪儿来的？
如果告诉了你……？ 我和$npc:11000173[gender:0]$做过交易的事情，能一笔勾销吗？
知道了。
说那可不行。
其实…… 那些是<font color="#ffd200">把近卫队准备在活动中使用的武器融化掉而制成的铁矿石</font>…… 因为量很大，为了不让人发现才把它卖给了$npc:11000173[gender:0]$。
我收到了<font color="#ffd200">王室官吏的特别订单</font>。 说因为觐见仪式取消，这些东西都没用了，让我把它们全部熔化掉。
问下订单的王室官吏是谁。
我也不知道。 那个人自称是从王室来的，让工人们把武器放在这里，然后就走了。
问剩下的铁矿石在哪里。
全部装在从$map:02000001$过来的卡车后运走了。
那我也不能告诉你。 你得答应把那份文件交给我，而且不要让我牵涉在内。 我就告诉你铁矿石是从哪儿来的。
知道了。
干嘛，干嘛，干嘛！ 我都告诉你了。又找我干什么？
询问从$map:02000001$过来的卡车是怎么回事。
那个？那是格尔多斯快递公司的卡车。 委托人让他到我这里来，把铁矿石运走。
问知不知道铁矿石要送到哪里。
我怎么知道？ 负责配送的配送司机应该知道。 他是从<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font>来的。你到那边去问问<font color="#ffd200">配送司机</font>好了。
其他的事情，你去问<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font> <font color="#ffd200">配送司机</font>吧。
嗯？你说找我有什么事？
询问从$map:02000084$运来的铁矿石的情况。
啊……我们每天要运几百件货物。 不可能全都记住……
你说是从$map:02000084$装的货物，是吧？ 我来看一下运送记录本。请稍等一下。
在你去$map:02000140$的时候，我找到了运送记录。 $map:02000084$……12个货物集装箱…… 里面装的东西是铁矿石……嗯…… 没有收件人姓名，只有配送地址。
询问配送地址。
地址是…… <font color="#ffd200">女王镇皇家大道125号</font>。
只要从$map:02000001$稍微往前走一点，就是<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000064$</font>。 如果觉得路太复杂，可以在<font color="#ffd200">小地图</font>上查看 通往$map:02000064$的传送门的位置。
迷路了吗？ 需要帮忙吗？
把地址告诉他，询问位置。
啊，你找对地方了。 就是我<font color="#ffd200">后面的仓库建筑</font>。 不久前<font color="#ffd200">王室把那里租了下来</font>。
问王室为什么要把仓库租下来。
啊，据说为了准备觐见仪式，王室仓库全都装满了。 即使在觐见仪式取消之后，也差不多每天会有一辆 集装箱来装卸货物。
问仓库由谁负责管理。
这个嘛……我也不知道谁是管理员。 卡车进出的时候，都是由我来确认身份证和出入证， 然后把门打开。
问能不能到仓库里面去看一下。
这个恐怕不行。只有持有王室认证的出入证的人， 才能进入仓库。
在桌子上发现了摆放整齐的账簿。 翻开账簿……
<font color="#ffd200">X月X日23点</font> 王室1号仓库 / 金块2箱 / 雷蒙 19300金币 <font color="#ffd200">X月X日22点</font> 王室武器库 / 新武器8吨 / 计划进行交易
王室武器库……新武器…… 好像是<font color="#ffd200">与$map:02000001$武器库被盗事件有关的记录</font>。
王室武器库……新武器…… 好像是<font color="#ffd200">与$map:02000001$武器库被盗事件有关的记录</font>。
$MyPCName$。 我看你好久都没回来，还以为把我的委托给忘了呢。
拿出奇怪的账簿。
这是什么？
让他查看账簿。
嗯……？这些字，和<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000492[gender:0]$的笔迹</font>一模一样…… 还有<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000492[gender:0]$的签名</font>…… 嗯……
王室武器库……计划交易……新武器……？ 这……这是……<font color="#ffd200">武器库中不见了的武器</font>！！ 难道是<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000492[gender:0]$</font>？！！
这么说来……账簿上记录的日期…… 那天$npc:11000492[gender:0]$让我到$map:02000140$去一趟，所以我离开了一段时间。 我以为会有人来替我的班……难道那是调虎离山之计……？！
从这个账簿来看，好像不光是武器库……真是……不敢相信。 $npc:11000492[gender:0]$怎么会做出这种事……
啊……找到了。 $npc:11000492[gender:0]$的家庭住址是<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000119$鲜花公园674号</font>。 请到那里去找找看。
说谢谢。
太客气了。 啊，不过那是过去的住址，也许找起来有点难。如果难以分辨的话， 可以去鲜花花园地区寻找红色屋顶的房子。
$npc:11000492[gender:0]$的家庭住址是<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000119$鲜花公园674号</font>。 那是过去的住址，也许找起来有点难。 如果分不清的话，可以去鲜花公园地区寻找红色屋顶的房子。
门没有锁，里面空无一人。 屋里整理得非常干净，反而让人感觉很奇怪。
虽然房间空空如也，但里面某个地方肯定藏着可以追踪 $npc:11000492[gender:0]$行踪的线索。
虽然房间空空如也，但里面某个地方肯定藏着可以追踪 $npc:11000492[gender:0]$行踪的线索。
好像已经死了。
在$npc:11000492[gender:0]$周围看看能不能找到什么线索吧。
在$npc:11000492[gender:0]$周围看看能不能找到什么线索吧。
$MyPCName$！！ 在近卫队开始调查之前，$npc:11000492[gender:0]$大人，不，是$npc:11000492[gender:0]$突然消失了， 现在都乱成了一锅粥。 $MyPCName$，你有没有在找$npc:11000492[gender:0]$啊？
讲述在$map:52000037$发生的事情。
嗯？$npc:11000492[gender:0]$……他已经死了吗？天哪…… 不能在这里浪费时间了，必须赶快把这件事告诉$npc:11000119[gender:0]$才行。
询问$npc:11000119[gender:0]$有没有恢复原样。
是的。 $npc:11000119[gender:0]$在接到我的报告后，似乎就意识到了 事态的严重性。
不过……我似乎难逃惩罚了。 因为我没有及时上报武器消失的事，打算自己解决。 我也做错了事啊……
但是$npc:11000119[gender:0]$说非常认可我为了寻求正义而作出的努力， 如果我的报告能成为爱德华大人<font color="#ffd200">回归的契机</font>， 就算受罚也没关系！
请你尽快向$npc:11000119[gender:0]$报告调查结果， 并说明有关那本手册的详细情况。 拜托了。
把什么东西忘在这里了吗？
说忘了要干什么了。
啊，是的。给你。
刚才我看你放进背包里了…… 请在背包里仔细找找。
你的背包很沉的样子…… 要不要整理下？

守护石-红狼之心， 智者-阿西莫夫， 百发百中-马诺维奇，灵魂-男爵， 闪光-维恩·斯蒂尔顿， 斩魔刀-坦……
还有……光之魔法师基里安大人。
在曾经的光明与黑暗的战争中……如果没有那七位英雄， 就没有现在的冒险岛世界。 但是，即便有如此多的牺牲和努力，黑暗还是没有被消除。 我想$MyPCName$你应该很清楚这些事吧。
现在冒险岛世界再一次需要英雄来拯救。 我坚信$MyPCName$就是那些英雄之一。

说可以做到。
很好……！祝你好运。 记住，如果出了什么事，即使丢掉自己性命…… 也绝不能让人发现我们是守护军派来的秘密工作员。
记住，如果出了什么事，即使丢掉自己性命…… 也绝不能让人发现我们是守护军派来的秘密工作员。

跟你没关系！ 除了<font color="#ffd200">鲁米纳军人</font>之外，我不相信任何人！
快出去…… 我可不想因为和你待在一起，而被监视者当成是和你一伙的！

呵呵，是吗？ 那我好像比你知道得多一点。
嗯，不久前，听某个来买毒草的客人说…… 在黑暗之地的某个地方，有个名叫<font color="#ffd200">奴隶之塔</font>的地方。 影子军团把从冒险岛世界劫持来的人和在阴影世界反抗魔王的人 关在了<font color="#ffd200">没有出口的高塔</font>中，把他们当成奴隶使唤……
但是……不久前有一些人从奴隶之塔中逃了出来。 那些人说，<font color="#ffd200">鲁米纳军人</font>说要带领他们把其他奴隶解救出来！ 根据传闻，他们确实成功地救出了几个被移送到其他地方的奴隶。
因此在奴隶们之间，流传着<font color="#ffd200">鲁米纳军人</font>有一天 会来拯救自己的传闻。
由于鲁米纳军人的原因，影子军团的指挥官也很紧张。 因此加强了奴隶之塔的警戒，运送奴隶时也加强了警卫。
问有没有办法可以见到鲁米纳军人。
这个嘛……？我也不知道。 我又不是鲁米纳军人……要是被影子军团抓到的话，就会送命。 他们又不是傻瓜，怎么会在这里留下痕迹？
过来买毒草的那个客人说，他为了获得赏金，曾经试着 追踪鲁米纳军人。他在$map:03000134$发现了他们最后的 集结处之后，就再也找不到任何痕迹了。
嗯……也许鲁米纳军人会留下只有他们才知道的暗号…… 其他的我也不知道了。
问$map:03000134$的鲁米纳军人最后集结处在什么位置。
叫什么来着……好像是$map:03000134$的太阳能实验中心……？ 他们把那座建筑的屋顶当成是集结处。
你连$map:03000134$的太阳能实验中心都不知道吗？ 那里一般人都知道……看来你对黑暗之地还不是很熟悉。
在从$map:03000134$通往$map:03000092$的路口，可以看到屋顶上 安装着太阳能板的建筑。 那就是太阳能实验中心。
你是谁？ 你怎么知道这里的？

想了解鲁米纳军人的话，先说说你是谁，从哪儿来吧。 你也应该知道，在黑暗之地中不存在<font color="#ffd200">无条件的信任</font>。

果然……他们根本都不在意…… 难道他们还不知道……嗯……
包括我在内的鲁米纳军人曾经都是<font color="#ffd200">奴隶之塔</font>的奴隶。 大部分奴隶都是被影子军团从冒险岛世界劫持到这里的人。 一开始……我们相信守护军一定会去救我们…… 但是随着时间的流逝，我们终于明白了。
我们<font color="#ffd200">被抛弃和遗忘</font>了…… 因此我们决定靠自己的力量从那里逃出去。 我们花了很长时间做准备…… 在成功之前……我们失去了很多同伴。
看着同伴们一个个离我们而去，我们下定了决心。 一定要把关在<font color="#ffd200">奴隶之塔</font>中的人全部救出来！ 于是我们组成了<font color="#ffd200">鲁米纳军人</font>。
说希望能帮助鲁米纳军人。

我<font color="#ffd200">必须找到我的朋友</font>，<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000064[gender:0]$</font>…… 那是和我一起计划从<font color="#ffd200">奴隶之塔</font>中逃出来的朋友…… 但是在逃出来之前，他被影子军团的指挥官带走后，就再也没回来。

和妹妹失散之后，我四处寻找妹妹，差点被影子军团成员击败。 那时，是那个朋友救了我的命。 他一直耐心倾听我的话，经常安慰我…… 现在回想起来，关于他自己，他好像一次都没提到过。
如果他真的死了，我想找到他的尸体，让他能够安息……

The empress needs to speak to you about our next steps. Please meet with her in the palace.
The empress is waiting for you in the palace.
It's time for us to show the strength of our alliance. We can no longer allow ourselves to simply react against the darkness.
Now that you're here, we can hold the first meeting of our new alliance. Please come with me to $map:52000087$.
I'll join you in a moment, so please take this time to introduce yourselves to each other.
Until we learn more about her, Madria will continue to hound us at every corner. This is a key mission, and I want it in the hands of someone I can trust.
This is no simple request. $MyPCName$, can I count on you?
I'll do my best.
I had a feeling you would say that. $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ can fill you in on the details.
It seems like we're always sending you to handle impossible tasks on your own. It just goes to show how much we trust you. At least, I hope you see it that way.
Tell me about this impossible task.
Karkar Island was a holy place to the lumarigon. I doubt it's coincidence that this dragon-man is looking for them there.
We've set up a temporary headquarters in $map:02010002$. If you travel to Karkar Island and meet with our man $npcName:11001311[gender:0]$ there, he can give you the details.
The seas are rough around that area, so we weren't able to get you a ship. Luckily, we found another way to get there. Tell $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ in $map:02000183$ that I sent you.
I pray that you return with good news.
Tell $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ in $map:02000183$ that I sent you. He'll get you to Karkar Island.
And who are you?
I'm with the Maple Alliance.
Yeah, I took some of your guys over to Karkar a few days ago. Listen up, you goon. The Lumiwind isn't your toy!
I don't care if you're the empress herself. I sailed the Lumiwind before she was ready thanks to you people, and now she's broken! I'm sunk without my repair guy...
What's a Lumiwind?

She's my ship, you lunk! A perfect marriage of sleek design and rugged individuality! A dream made reality! Emma thought I was a dope for wanting to soar the skies. I still remember that night, when we...
Focus!
Oh! Right. The Lumiwind is a big flying ship. Unlike boats that are stuck sailing the ocean, we can go anywhere in the world on this beauty.
Great. Then take me to $map:02010002$.
Aren't you listening? She broke down after I took your soldiers to Karkar Island. If only $npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ was here...
And who is $npcName:11001011[gender:0]$?
Argh! Just hearing his name makes me want to scream!
Argh! Just hearing his name makes me want to scream!
Sigh... I'm fed up with him, but he's still my friend...
$npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ is my partner in crime. The Lumiwind would still be a pipe dream without his engineering genius. But he ditched me a while ago, accused us of wasting our time. The nerve!
What made him change his mind?

Well... A lot of newer tech makes the Lumiwind a tiny bit obsolete. Sure, our ship doesn't have an onboard computer or internal combustion or seat belts, but it's our dream! Doesn't that count for something?
So, you need $npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ to make this thing fly again...
Well, yeah. He's a genius, but a stubborn genius. If you can convince him to help out, then I'll take you wherever you want to go.
Where can I find him?
He didn't go far. I heard he just bought a house in $map:02000182$.
$npcName:11001011[gender:0]$ just bought a house in $map:02000182$. I doubt you'll convince him, but you're welcome to try.
What do you want?
I need your help fixing the Lumiwind.
Oh? I shoulda known that fool $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ would break her...
I poured my best years into that bucket of gears, and he can't even keep it running for a few days... But that doesn't matter to me anymore. Leave me alone.
You don't care that the Lumiwind may never fly again?
Sure... I reckon nobody could fix her up like I could. But that changes nothing. I can't help you.
Why not?
Sigh... I suppose telling you won't matter one way or the other. I dedicated my life to building the Lumiwind, you know? Long days and late nights... Even weekends...

After a decade of hard work, we came up with a flying ship that didn't need any of the fancy high-tech gizmos that younger engineers rely on. It was the birth of a whole new kind of ship! But... that's when I realized...
I wanted to celebrate with my family, but they didn't know who I was no more. I ran so blindly towards my dream, I didn't even realize I'd left them behind. That's why I gave up the Lumiwind.
I wanted to celebrate with my family, but they didn't know who I was no more. I ran so blindly towards my dream, I didn't even realize I'd left them behind. That's why I gave up the Lumiwind.
I promised to put this whole inventing business behind me, and my family took me back. I can't bear to lose them again.
There's nothing you can say to change my mind. Sorry.
Okay. I'll just get some scientists to help instead.
S-scientists? No! Who knows what those miscreants would install on my Lumiwind?!
Some computers. A new engine. Maybe a seat belt or two!
Are you out of your mind? Only I can complete the Lumiwind! Don't you dare hand it over to those hacks!
But you already said you can't help me.
Wait! Not so fast. I'll help if you swear not to let any of their hoity-toity science near my airship! I just... need you to cover for me while I'm gone.
I can do that.
When we moved here, the realtor said we'd wake up every morning to the sound of the waves. But you know what? This place is teeming with noisy pirates! My wife asked me to kick them out.
I'll take care of the pirates. You fix the Lumiwind.
You'd do that for me? All right. I'll have the Lumiwind in flying shape by the time you're done!
You take care of the pirates, and I'll take care of the Lumiwind.
Hear that? The sound of the ocean, and not a yo-ho-ho in earshot! You've got a knack for pirate-pummeling.
How are the repairs going?
Don't you worry about a thing. I'm a mechanical genius, after all. The Lumiwind could still use some finishing touches, but she'll fly, all right.
Thanks. I know this wasn't easy for you.
Don't mention it. Really. Especially not to my wife!
$npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ should let you ride the Lumiwind now. You and your alliance buddies are going to Karkar Island, right? Good luck!
$npcName:11001276[gender:0]$ should let you ride the Lumiwind now. You and your alliance buddies are going to Karkar Island, right? Good luck!
I've got to say, you surprised me. I never thought I'd see that old curmudgeon pick up a wrench again.
He's trying to find work-life balance.
Hmph... I guess he didn't have much time for his family in the old days. But he never looked happier than when he was working on the Lumiwind. People are funny, eh?
So, when do we depart?
Whenever you're ready!
Ready to fly to Karkar Island, the land of sand and sun?
Ready to fly to Karkar Island, the land of sand and sun?
Welcome to Karkar Island. Pretty different from Victoria Island, right?
Where's the Maple Alliance base?
You're with those soldiers, then? I think they're staying in $map:02010002$. You just have to cross the Tiares Desert.
This place is beautiful, but dangerous! They even say that this weird dragon-man started appearing lately...
Cross the Tiares Desert to reach $map:02010002$. Your Maple Alliance buddies should be there.
Cross the Tiares Desert to reach $map:02010002$. Your Maple Alliance buddies should be there.
Y-you're $MyPCName$! It's an honor to meet you! Me and the others are real... real pleased that you'll be taking charge of the investigation, $male:sir,female:ma'am$.
Is something wrong?
Ah... Well, yes. We didn't expect the mission to be quite this... difficult...
To be honest, most of us thought the rumors of a humanoid dragon monster were made-up nonsense. But there's too much going on here that we just don't understand...
I can't get into this here. $npcName:11001311[gender:0]$ is inside. He'll fill you in.
$npcName:11001311[gender:0]$ is inside. He'll fill you in.
It's about time we got reinforcements!
Bring me up to speed.
Right. That. It started when we were sent to investigate reports of some kind of dragon-man.
We've run into all kinds of problems since we got here, and we don't have the manpower to do anything about it. So... we've been sitting tight, waiting for you.

If I can be frank with you, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, we're all terrified ever since we heard about the attack on Tria. If the enemy is brave enough to attack the capital in force, what's to stop them from snuffing our little squad out?
That's why we have to watch each others' backs.
We aren't strong like you, $male:sir,female:ma'am$. I don't think you can understand how we feel.
We want to help you. We really do. But nobody's got the courage left to step forward... I think I can rally the troops, but I need more time.
I'll handle things for now, but I expect you to pull it together.
Y-yes, $male:sir,female:ma'am$.
Can you tell me anything useful, at least?

We've interviewed the locals, but they haven't exactly been helpful. Then we heard that $npcName:11000251$ is here. You know, the boss of Blackstar? He said that he had information for us, but that we didn't have anything worth trading.
Where is he right now?
You think you can get him to talk? I don't think he'll be persuaded peacefully... But if you're sure, he's been seen in the $map:52010010$.
That place is crawling with his thugs. I have a feeling that they'll work with you if you rough them up first, though.
$npcName:11000251$ was last spotted in the $map:52010010$. That place is crawling with his thugs. I have a feeling that they'll work with you if you rough them up first, though.
W-wait! You made your point. Let's talk, okay?
I apologize for my men's... rudeness earlier. So, what do you want, huh?
I'm here to see $npcName:11000251$.
Are you nuts? The boss doesn't meet with just anyone. What makes you so special?
Do you really need another demonstration?
D-don't be hasty! J-just let me ring him up. Wait one second...
Well, aren't you lucky? He wants to meet the $male:man,female:woman$ who roughed up his lackeys. Just go through the door behind me.
Just go through the door behind me. $npcName:11000251$ is waiting.
I was curious to see the hooligan who roughed up my men. And lo and behold, it's the great $MyPCName$.
You know my name.
Reckless kids like you aren't very common. I prefer to know them all. Now, what business do you have with me?
I'm looking for a dragon-man.
You know, the Maple Alliance came by and said the same question. I didn't think you were a mere lackey, but it seems they have you on their leash.
Do you know anything or not?
Sure, I have the answers you're after. But why should I give you such information for free?
I could use someone of your caliber. Do a little job for me, and you'll get your answers.
And what might this little job be?
My organization possesses... possessed two trains known as the Blaknovs. These trains have been stolen by hijackers. I don't take kindly to those who breach the code of honor among thieves.
Fools like this are beneath my attention, but still... they must be made into examples of what happens when you cross Blackstar.
You seem perfect for the job. So, what do you say? Want to ditch that stuffy empress and work for me, instead?
I'll get your train back, but this is a one-time deal.
Sure, sure. Now hurry along. If you let those trains slip away, then you'll miss out on your precious information.
I've got another train ready to take you to the Blaknovs at the $map:02010009$. Can't wait to hear about your exploits, kid.

I've got another train ready to take you to the Blaknovs at the $map:02010009$. My idiot subordinates, $npcName:11003124[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003125[gender:0]$, are trapped on that train. Bring them back... alive.
Hmph! I didn't expect you'd make it back alive. Seems like I should have given you a harder job.
You owe me answers.
And you'll get them! I'm a man of my word, after all.
The dragon-man you're looking for is seeking the lumarigons. It's probably chasing the same objective you and your Maple Alliance are after.
O-objective? What objective? We're totally aimless!

Play dumb all you want. There's nothing Blackstar doesn't know about. Anyway, you'll be happy to know that the creature didn't find any traces of the lumarigons. They're long gone, no matter what either of you think.
However, there are certain... children that the Dragon Master sacrified himself to protect.
Who are these children?
Hold on. I agreed to answer your questions... about the dragon-man. If you want to ask questions about anything else, well...
What do you want this time?
Nothing you wouldn't do anyway. See, Blackstar's poured a lot of money into Karkar Island. Ludari City owes a lot of its prosperity to our generous contributions.

Anyway, we got an infestation in one of our new establishments here on the island. Can't run a business with bugs crawling all over, can you? If you want any more information, you'll take care of our little bug problem.
Deal, but then you tell me everything.
That works for me. The site is $map:02010019$. I'll send $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ word that you're on your way.
The site is $map:02010019$. I'll send $npcName:11001342[gender:0]$ word that you're on your way.
You're the exterminator? Thank goodness. If we don't get this place up and running again, I'll lose my job!

I don't know where they came from or why they're here, but a huge swarm of bugs have completely taken over the place. I've been through all the exterminators in town already, but they were no good. At this rate, we'll have to close up shop!
This sounds like a job for... me.
Great! Start by thinning out the swarm. Please, I'm begging you!
Start by thinning out the swarm. Please, I'm begging you!
That was some of the best exterminating I've ever seen!
That's a fine start. Now all we have to do is take out their general, and $map:02010019$ will be free!
Their... general?
Yes, a great, big, hideous, savage, rude beast of a bug! It led the swarm straight into the park and took over the pool.
Where can I find this bad bug?
Go up this rainbow hill and you'll see it. Good luck!
Go up this rainbow hill. The bug king has taken over the park's interior.
You did it! You really did it! Hooray!

If the park had shut down, I'd be out of a job. No job, no money. No money, no apartment... You saved my skin. I can't thank you enough, but maybe a nice big paycheck can. It should be waiting for you at headquarters.
Your paycheck should be waiting for you at headquarters.
You're handy, you know that? I can see why the empress keeps you around. What's your official title back home? Royal exterminator?
You owe me answers.
Temper, temper! Now, what shall I tell you first?
They say that Biset, the last of the Dragon Masters, died protecting four orphans. This makes them a link to the lumarigons, but there's more.
One of these children supposedly has the Lumenstone, a jewel passed down from Dragon Master to Dragon Master. If that's true, then I bet your dragon-man is looking for this child.
Then I need to find them first...
There are four of them, and they all grew up right here on Karkar Island. But...
But?
They're sneaky little street rats. Even my organization had trouble tracking them down. Luckily for you, I happen to have two of them already...
They're your prisoners?!

They're my guests! Champions of the arena. One beat some of our best fighters, and the other got first place in our motorcycle derby. $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001297[gender:1]$, Biset's little urchins in the flesh.

$npcName:11001294[gender:0]$ isn't seeing visitors. But, since you've been such a good kid, I'll let you meet $npcName:11001297[gender:1]$. She's putting her legs up in $map:02010064$ over at $map:02010016$.
I've been more than generous with you. Remember that next time you need to deal with Blackstar!
$npcName:11001297[gender:1]$'s putting her legs up in $map:02010064$ over at $map:02010016$.
I'm sick and tired of you guys. Get out of my sight!
For the last time, I don't know anything about the lumarigons, and nothing you do to me will change that!
I'm with the Maple Alliance, not Blackstar.
So what? Maple Alliance, Blackstar, you're all the same. All you care about is hassling me for answers I don't have!
How can I earn your trust?
Hmm... If you're really one of the good guys, prove it by doing some hero stuff. One of my friends is in danger. Rescue him for me.
Who is he?
He's a big, gentle dope named $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$. He may not look it, but he's the champion of Ludari Arena.
I heard he isn't taking visitors.
Isn't... or can't? He won one of Blackstar's stupid tournaments, and now they won't let him go.
Where is he now?
They're not exactly letting me look around, now are they? But I heard someone say that he's going to fight a guy named Vasara Chen in the $map:52010004$. I'd start there.
I heard someone say that he's going to fight a guy named Vasara Chen in the $map:52010004$. I'd start there.
Is this the end for me...?
I'll never betray my friends...!
Calm down. I'm on your side.
You aren't with Blackstar...? No, I guess you aren't wearing one of their tacky suits...
$npcName:11001297[gender:1]$ sent me to save you.
$npcName:11001297[gender:1]$ got caught too...? What are those Blackstar guys up to...?
I think they're after the Lumenstone.
I thought they took me 'cause I wouldn't throw a match... My friends are in danger...!
Well, Blackstar hasn't found them yet, at least.
Please make sure they're okay! I'd go with you, but I bet Blackstar's got eyes on us. I better keep them distracted. You go on to $map:02010053$ and find the owner...
I'll keep your friends safe.
Be careful. $npcName:11001292[gender:0]$ acts cool, but he has a crazy temper... He'll run off and get hurt if you tell him Blackstar has us. Just tell him we're okay.
Go to $map:02010053$ and find the owner. Make sure my friends are safe...
If you're hungry, you need to wait your turn.
$npcName:11001294[gender:0]$ sends his regards.
Don't be cute with me. The only time $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$ "sends his regards" is when he's in trouble. What's going on?
$npcName:11001294[gender:0]$'s fine! Really!
If that's what he told you to say, then he must be in deep trouble. Cough up the details or I'll fry you in this oil!
Well? Spit it out!
Blackstar has your friends.
So, you abandoned them to come find me? You're a real stand-up $male:guy,female:gal$, you know that?
Want to try calming down?
Cram it! Tell me where my friends are. I'm going to destroy those Blackstar chumps.
Blackstar won't hurt your friends until they get the Lumenstone.
Oh, so you think Blackstar has my friends up in a four-star hotel? All so they can get their hands on some stone? Some stone that... Huh.
Huh?
$npcName:11000735$'s got this rock she takes with her everywhere she goes. It always had a strange shine to it. Could that be what they're after?
Do you know where she is?
She tends to wander for days. Her usual spot is a bit far from here... and I need to stay in town until the others are safe.
You take care of your friends. I'll find Mika.
I guess I'll have to trust you for now. But if you double-cross me... you know what'll happen.

Once you leave Ludari City, you'll see some ruins. Mika likes to wander them. She says they energize her... But they're too big to search on your own. Keep going until you hit $map:02010063$ and find a meerkat named $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$.
The meerkat scouts know every inch of Karkar Island. If anyone can find her, they can. But remember... Anything bad happens to her, and it'll happen to you tenfold!
Go to $map:02010063$ and find a meerkat named $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$. If anyone can find Mika, the meerkats can. But remember... Anything bad happens to her, and it'll happen to you tenfold!
What do you want? I'm busy scoutin'!
Have you seen a girl named Mika?
Mika? Girl? Carrying something shiny? Yes, yes, saw her days ago. She was mumbling about a snowy kingdom that vanished!
Uh... Do you know where she went?
I know, I know. And I'll tell. But first, you'll help me!
Old kingdom of Merjit used to be here! Humans who worshipped lumarigons. They went bad and now they're gone. But lately, their spirits rise from the graves to haunt their ruins!
So you want me to bust up some ghosts?
I don't care who you bust up. I just want to know what happens in the pyramid in $map:02010023$.
Find out what's going on in the pyramid at $map:02010023$!
What a creepy pyramid! I have a feeling this is just the beginning. My scouts will take it from here!
The human girl went into the $map:02010026$. Maybe she was looking for a new base? I don't understand humans.
The human girl went into the $map:02010026$. Maybe she was looking for a new base? I don't understand humans.
It was the wrong girl! My mistake. All humans look the same.
My intel was wrong. That usually doesn't happen! The others will help. You'll see. We'll find her!
Thanks. In the meantime, have you seen any dragon-human hybrids?
No, but I've heard of one! Dragon wings and a tail. And a big, big sword!
Do you know where he went?
To the Moropapa Tribe. He caused big trouble for them. Big trouble! The Moropapa Tribe knows much, more than anyone. They can tell you. But... they don't like strangers. I have to vouch for you.
I'd appreciate that.
Go to $map:02010023$! Miss $npcName:11001315[gender:1]$'s a friend. And the granddaughter of the Moropapa chief. She'll help!
Go to $map:02010023$! Miss $npcName:11001315[gender:1]$'s a friend. And the granddaughter of the Moropapa chief. She'll help!
$npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ wrote that you'd be coming. He said I should help you...

Strangers aren't welcome here. We used to open our doors to outsiders, but ever since the Land of Darkness was sealed years ago, gramps became weary of strangers. It's against the rules for me to help you.
Can I try talking to the chief?
Gramps isn't feeling too hot. He already strained himself dealing with another outsider today. Now, if that's all...
Maybe I can help!
Well... Okay. Look inside the jars around town. I need $itemPlural:30000492$ for gramps's medicine, but bugs got into our stores. They're... gross.
Leave the gross bugs to me.
Really? Even after I said I couldn't help you? Thanks!
Please get the herbs from the jars around town. Gramps needs them badly...
Thanks! Gramps'll perk up in no time!
Gramps is coming around. I told you it'd be no time at all!
I guess you can meet with him, after all. He hates strangers, but you diiiid kinda save his life.
It would be an honor.
You're pretty nice for an outsider. Gramps is in the mud hut with the eggs on the roof.
Gramps is in the mud hut with the eggs on the roof.
I sense something ominous... If Varrekant isn't stopped...
The $map:52010006$ that $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ mentioned is in $map:02010030$. Hurry up and rescue that poor girl!
The $map:52010006$ that $npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ mentioned is in $map:02010030$. Hurry up and rescue that poor girl!
$MyPCName$! I have something to report!
$npcName:11001313[gender:0]$ filled us in. We were inspired by your heroics, and decided to get back to work.
Are you sure you're up to it?

We're fine! Compared to what you're doing, our work is a walk in the park. Anyway, we managed to get on the hybrid's trail, and we saw him go into the $map:02010029$. Some of us were injured in the process, but we'll be ready to move out soon.
You take care of your wounded. I'll take it from here.
Yes, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! We'll regroup so we're ready to support you when you need us. Now, based on the direction he was headed, I think he's going into the $map:02010055$.
Where?
It's some important site for the lost kingdom of Merjit. It was originally a temple for the lumarigons, but the Merjit started using it for dark rituals... I'd be careful there if I were you!
I'm sure that monster is headed for the $map:02010055$. We'll regroup so we're ready to support you when you need us.
You're safe! And what happened to Varrekant?
He fell into the ravine.
Hm... I can't see him surviving that. While you were fighting him, we managed to recover the Lumenstone.
Great. But we didn't learn anything about Madria...
You're right! Dang... Was this whole trip a waste?
We did manage to save the world again. That's something.
Haha... Let's hope the empress sees it that way! I wonder if we could use the Lumenstone as a weapon against the darkness?
I think we should return the stone to its owner.
Ah... Good point, $male:sir,female:ma'am$. We aren't thieves, after all.
I'd better start packing our supplies for the return trip. When you're done here, talk to $npcName:11001310[gender:0]$.
$npcName:11001363[gender:1]$ had a rough time here. She came by and told us to give you her thanks.
I should speak with her before leaving for Tria.
I'd better start packing our supplies for the return trip. When you're done here, talk to $npcName:11001310[gender:0]$.
I'd better start packing our supplies for the return trip. When you're done here, talk to $npcName:11001310[gender:0]$.
Oh! We were just talking about you.
I hope you didn't overhear any of it. Someone doesn't know how to be grateful.
Shouldn't you be the grateful one? If $MyPCName$ hadn't come along, you'd have "put it all on the line" and "tossed aside your life" to save me. At least, that's what Dunba and Tara told me...
I-I never—For a friend! I-I'd do that for any of my friends! Th-that's what friendship is all about, r-right?
Don't mind them. They're always like that. Anyway, thanks. You're the reason we're all together again. For now, at least.
Maybe Blackstar will leave us alone now that the Lumenstone is lost.
I loved that necklace... Do you think it's really gone forever?
Not lost! In fact, I'm here to return it.
Really? Wow! Thanks, but... I really can't take it back.
Why not?
Your friends with the Maple Alliance said you were fighting a powerful enemy. Someone who'd taken the lives of your friends. And that my necklace could help you win...
I know how it feels to lose someone you love. If my necklace can help you, then you can have it.
Thank you. I'll bring it back someday.
Well, duh! It's not like I'm letting you have it to keep!
We're ready to return to Tria when you are.
(A sense of foreboding fills you.)
Is there a problem?
I suddenly have a bad feeling...
I bet you're just tired from everything that's happened. You'll feel better when we get back to Tria.
I bet you're just tired from everything that's happened. You'll feel better when we get back to Tria.
Welcome back, $MyPCName$. I hope you take some time to relax after this report, but first... Did you learn anything from your investigation in Karkar Island?
We couldn't find anything related to Madria.
I see... Well, at least you've returned safely. Perhaps one of the other heroes will find something.
(Tell her about Varrekant, Mika, and the Lumenstone.)
So it is still possible to cross the dimensions. For a nova to appear now, when the forces of darkness are spreading... It couldn't be mere coincidence, could it?
I don't know why Biset entrusted Mika with his Lumenstone, but he must have had good reason. He never took any action lightly.
Can we use the Lumenstone somehow?
The scholars at Ellinel are doing their own research on the magic used by Madria and her pet. If that monster really is related to the lumarigons, then the Lumenstone could lead us to it.
I shall have my royal magician study it personally. If there is a connection, $npcName:11000042[gender:1]$ will find it. Now, you should take some time to recuperate.
I can't take a break while everyone else is working so hard.
Tireless, as always. $MyPCName$, you're at the heart of all the work we're doing here. We can't have you collapsing from exhaustion.
没听见我让你出去吗？ 你这个无礼的家伙……！！
没听见我让你出去吗？ 你这个无礼的家伙……！！
咦……你怎么…… <font color="#ffd200">光之龙</font>……<font color="#ffd200">神龙</font>真的回到这片土地上了吗！！
问是不是认出了$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$。
怎么会不认得呢…… 虽然是不同的血脉……但我们萌茸茸部族从古代神龙诞生之日起， 直到他们消失之前，一直都和他们在一起。 和守护神龙的龙骑士们不同，我们是神龙的同伴。
神龙从这片土地上完全消失之后，我们萌茸茸部族也从世界上消失了。 我们在沙漠中流浪，过着安静的隐居生活。 但是……不久前我看到被黑暗笼罩的沙漠边上有发光的星星落下。
那时，我们本能地感觉到。神龙又回到了这片土地上…… 于是我带领家人们，又重新来到了外面的世界。
好了，现在讲讲你们的故事吧。 到底发生了什么事？
讲述$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$的情况和故事。
嗯……原来如此…… 这么说来，不久前掉落到这片土地上的星光……可能是<font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>的<font color="#ffd200">记忆</font>。 嗯……怎么才能找到那些记忆呢……
嗯……也许……在古代神龙们留下的记录中可以找到寻找记忆的方法…… 如果你们能找到记载着神龙的记录的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000471$</font>和<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000470$</font>， 我可以帮你们解读那些记录。
$map:02010023$是埋藏古代神龙的记录最多的地方。 仔细寻找的话，一定可以找到那些记录。
$map:02010023$是埋藏古代神龙的记录最多的地方。 仔细寻找的话，一定可以找到那些记录。
哦，来啦？ 东西找到了吗……？
拿出找到的东西。
嗯……这些东西……好像少了点……
……等$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$到了之后，让我们先试试看。 只要光之命运在引导着那个孩子……在不毛之地也能绽放出鲜花……
……等$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$到了之后，让我们先试试看。 只要光之命运在引导着那个孩子……在不毛之地也能绽放出鲜花……
问有没有解读出什么东西。
<font color="#ffd200">交感</font>！！现在我终于知道了。 <font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>为何明知自己也许无法再次醒来，却把自己的记忆分成了碎片， 送到了这片土地上…… 据说神龙们可以共享各自的记忆和想法。
将看不见、摸不着的记忆变成实体并送出去的时候……神龙必须 消耗巨大的能量，甚至必须做好付出生命的准备。 但是当那些记忆被传递给另一个神龙，并合成一个整体的时候， 发送出记忆的神龙就可能重新苏醒……
<font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>一定是希望<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$</font>能通过神龙的交感仪式， 阅读她留下的那些记忆。
问交感仪式该怎么做。
首先……必须找到<font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>的记忆，然后还需要在交感仪式中起媒介作用的中间人。 帮助举行交感仪式的中间人，我会想办法去联系。
找到交感仪式的中间人啦！ <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001258[gender:1]$</font>！她是位了不起的神女，极其灵验。 不知为何，某一天她突然消失了，没留下一丝痕迹……
听说她正藏身于$map:02010026$某处，过着平静的隐居生活。 她……应该可以帮助我们。你和$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$一起去找找看。
听说她正藏身于$map:02010026$某处，过着平静的隐居生活。 她……应该可以帮助我们。你和$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$一起去找找看。
有一道微弱之光穿透了黑暗…… 我早已知道，拥有灿烂光芒的贵客将会过来找我。
虽然黑暗遮挡了我的存在，你却能穿透黑暗找到我。 一切全都是光之命运的引导。 有什么需要我的帮助吗？
讲述交感仪式的情况，向她求助。
嗯……原来如此。 我可以帮助你。 但是……有件事让我很担心。
问在担心什么。
我之所以不得不避世而居…… 是因为黑暗深处的某个身份不明的存在，可以阅读我看到和听到的一切。
问发生了什么事。
我也不太清楚。 只是从那之后，我就失去了可以看见世界的双眼，只留下……模糊的记忆…… 总感觉有一股黑暗的气息在压制着我的身体，所以我才会那么推测。
如果你不介意这一点的话，我很乐意帮你。 你意下如何？
说暂时没别的办法，希望她能提供帮助。
明白了。 为了举行仪式，需要准备几样东西…… 昨晚在$map:02010026$徘徊的<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:21000694$</font>和<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:21000684$</font>闯了进来，把东西偷走了。 $MyPCName$，你能帮我找回丢失的东西吗？
为了举行仪式，需要准备几样东西…… 昨晚在$map:02010026$徘徊的<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:21000694$</font>和<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:21000684$</font>闯了进来，把东西偷走了。 $MyPCName$，你能帮我找回丢失的东西吗？
谢谢。 幸好全都完好无损，不需要另外进行什么处理。
好了……现在让我们开始举行仪式吧。 做好打开交感通道，与<font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>的记忆碎片进行交感的准备之后，预言之珠就会 开始发光。那时，请走到交感通道中。
好了……现在让我们开始举行仪式吧。 做好打开交感通道，与<font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>的记忆碎片进行交感的准备之后，预言之珠就会 开始发光。那时，请走到交感通道中。
啊……$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$……
问$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$为什么突然跑出去。
$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$……她通过交感仪式，看到比你看到过的更多的东西。 她阅读了<font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>想要传达的所有记忆。 从现在起，她就应该知道自己今后必须做什么了。
问蕾拉传递给米卡的记忆是什么。

$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$……她是可以完全控制光之力量的唯一的神龙…… 她是<font color="#ffd200">蕾拉</font>，以及德拉姆和卡尔卡尔的希望。 对那个希望造成威胁的……是非常可怕的黑暗之龙……<font color="#ffd200">魔龙</font>。 $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$必须将蕾拉的记忆碎片全部聚集起来，找到古代神龙的圣所， 获得完整的光之力量，重生为真正的神龙。
只有那样……<font color="#ffd200">龙石</font>才会得到净化，恢复原来的光芒。 只有那样，她才能获得对抗<font color="#ffd200">魔龙</font>的力量。
虽然$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$知道了自己必须做什么，但要想以一己之力继承光之命运， 并带领世界迈向未来，绝非易事。 $MyPCName$，她需要像你这样的同伴的帮助……啊……！！
问干嘛突然那样。
呃……他……黑暗中的那个人……正在……阅读我看到的东西…… 查看$npcName:11000735[gender:1]$的命运…… 你们必须找到存在于这片土地上的所有蕾拉的记忆碎片。
