Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.
Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.
Adventurers, may I have your attention. Our gracious hostess will speak in a just a moment.
Before she begins, there is one matter I wish to clarify... If the young miss should say something unusual, please do not take offense. It is not her intent to be rude...
Pemberton, I don't remember deciding there would be any speeches at this event! This is not some common gala!
This is a solemn occasion. We are here to forge a pact between our family, these adventurers, and myself. We are here to issue a proclamation to the world!
...Ahem. Welcome, adventurers, my honored guests—you who go forth boldly to serve as the eyes, ears, hands, and feet of this great new endeavor.
I am Lady Beatrice, director of the Frontier Foundation.
I trust the tea and hors d'ouevres were to everyone's liking? They were prepared by a world-class chef, after all.
But I'm afraid we don't have time for such niceties. The matter at hand is most serious.
As you all know, an unprecedented phenomenon is occurring throughout this world. These so-called lapenshards, these mysterious crystals, are cropping up everywhere you look.

You've all no doubt heard the stories—a miraculous stone granting power to those in want. You might have guessed that these crystals are, as their name denotes, miniatures of the very same lapentas created by the sages in times past.
You might be thinking, "these mere fragments surely cannot match the power of an unblemished lapenta!" Yes, that much is true. But they are still powerful enough to throw this world into crisis.
These crystals' minute size makes them trivial to gather and transport, and so they make their way rapidly across the land, empowering dangerous villains and causing strange and dangerous phenomena.

Funded by the gracious contributions of Tria's aristocracy—including Prime Minister Vidrem, and some of my own allowance—this Frontier Foundation was established to prevent exactly such situations as these.
The mission of the Frontier Foundation is simple. We travel far and wide to collect the lapenshards and gather them here, where we can carefully regulate them and prevent their misuse.
It is for this duty you were recruited. We have invited experts on the lapentas from all over. Allow me to present Terrun Calibre and Guidance, both friends to the royal court.
Well met, adventurers. My name is $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$ and I am a Runeblade of Terrun Calibre. It's an honor to be working alongside you.
Uh... Hi. I'm, uh, $npcName:11004029[gender:0]$... of... Guidance...
Speak up, brother $npcName:11004029[gender:0]$. They can't hear you. Brother, are you shaking?
Oh, um, hi! I'm $npcName:11003977[gender:1]$. I'm also from Guidance. You might have noticed we're not humans. We don't bite. We're just a little different, like Balon of the Seven Heroes.
Aren't you going to say something Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$...? Um... Brother? You look pale. Remember your breathing! In through the nose, out through the mouth!
Well then... We have invited this assembly of experts to the foundation because we believe their knowledge of rune magic and animus will prove valuable toward locating the lapenshards.
Wait a moment... Pemberton, do my eyes deceive me? Is that...?
Ah! You are correct, miss. That is the young $male:man,female:lady$ you've been looking for...
$MyPCName$!
$MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!
$MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!
$MyPCName$! I knew you were out there somewhere in the world do-gooding, but I never dreamed I'd meet you so soon!
Perhaps it's destiny...
Um... Have we met somewhere?
I could never forget the face of my savior! Oh brave warrior, guardian of my tender flesh...
I quite understand your confusion, $MyPCName$. The young miss was but one of the many people you saved on that day.
I speak of course of the attack on Tria.
The young lady receives regular treatment in Tria for a chronic illness. She was undergoing such a treatment the day Tria was besieged.
Who could have anticipated such an attack? The war against the dark host always seemed such a distant matter.
Seeing that great army beyond the city walls, I truly believed it was the end. Though we were prepared to evacuate, there was no route of escape.
And then I saw you, $MyPCName$, standing against that indomitable horde.
Of course everyone who fought for Tria that day was a hero. But without you there to defend the royal court, I shudder to think what might have happened.
Ever since that day the young miss has been looking for you, $MyPCName$. Oh, but I don't mean to imply she's obsessed...
I've been formulating a plan to acquire you for my own... Hehe...
That's not at all a creepy thing to say.
Oh! But I'm making a scene. Now, everyone, this concludes our commencement ceremony!
Adventurers, please join with your assigned groups and begin your missions. You will find all the pertinent details on your handouts.
$MyPCName$, oh arbiter of my fate—a moment of your time please.
As one of our most elite adventurers, you will serve under the direct control of the foundation director—that's me. In other words I will be entrusting you with the Foundation's most urgent mission.
I will come for you, after preparations are complete... Hehe.
$npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.
$npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.
$npcName:11003977[gender:1]$, was it? The adventurers have been assigned to groups and dispatched on their assignments, all according to your specifications.

I have to say, your plan was pretty detailed. Pairing them up based on their traits and abilities was a smart move. I'm surprised you were able to size them up so quick... Were you trained as a tactician?
Something like that! I'm pretty quick-witted, but it was actually Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ who came up with the assignments. Err... $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$?
Oh my... that $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ is so timid. Come over here and make some friends!
I'm not here to make friends. Get ready to go, we have our own assignments.
Aw! This is the perfect opportunity for Guidance to make a good first impression, and this is how you're using it? Oh! Our elite adventurer is here!
Um... Hello.
Director, let's get started.
You may lead the briefing, oh Moonlight Blade. I am satisfied simply to have $MyPCName$ in my servitude. Hehehe...

Yeesh. This is hard to watch. Reminds me of when you were younger, eh Eupheria? Whenever we were supposed to be training, you'd be off in your own world staring at $npcName:11003973[gender:0]$. Ow! What was that for?!
Close your mouth or I will cut out your tongue.
...Right. $MyPCName$, barring any further outbursts, I will now explain your personal assignment for the foundation.
We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.
We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.
We should begin by discussing the current state of affairs.
Since their appearance, there have been a number of incidents surrounding the lapenshards.
These incidents can largely be divided into two categories.
The first is the unauthorized distribution and misuse of the lapenshards.
Of special concern is the issue of evildoers and enemies of the common good who seek the lapenshards in the hopes of unleashing their power.
The adventurers we have just dispatched were tasked with preventing the acquisition and sale of lapenshards throughout the world.
The second class of incidents involve climate anomalies localized to specific regions.

At first glance, these incidents are nothing more than extreme weather phenomena. But they all began at about the same time the lapenshards appeared, and it is my belief that they have persisted far too long to be natural in cause.

Two such cases seem especially suspicious. To the south, the seas churn wildly, endangering any ships who sail them. To the northeast in the chilly mountains of El Nath, an unending blizzard rages cold enough to cause hypothermia in mere minutes.
It is my firm belief that these occurrences are connected to the lapenshards. Of course, we'll need to analyze each situation in order to determine the appropriate course of action.

Just bring a sample of any shards you find in the affected area, and I'll analyze it down to the microscopic level. Teehee. Oh, and there's something I want to talk to you about when we're done here...
<font color="#909090">(You give her a glib smile and a thumbs up.)</font>
$MyPCName$, it will be your personal assignment to investigate these strange phenomena, determine if they are indeed tied to the lapenshards, and, if possible, determine how best to end them.
Brother $npcName:11003976[gender:0]$ and I will go on ahead and investigate the blizzard in El Nath. Our fur and feathers offer us some protection from the extreme cold.
$MyPCName$, I'll leave the ocean disturbances to you. I imagine you won't have too much trouble with the intelligence we've already gathered.
Already? Outstanding. I see my allowance is not wasted.
Well then, I leave Maple World's safety in all of your capable hands. Especially yours, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$, I'm sorry for not introducing myself sooner. I'm $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$, a Psion called to provide my expertise to the foundation.
If the Foundation was looking for someone with experience in magical objects like the lapenshards, they've found an expert in me!
By the way, there's something else I want to discuss with you. Do you have a moment?
The Foundation charter stipulates that adventurers carrying out special assignments on behalf of the organization are given special dispensation to make use of the lapenshards.
That's only part of why I wanted to talk to you. Hehehehe...
<font color="#909090">(What's with the creepy look on her face?)</font>
You smell like lapenshard. Or rather, I sense the energy of a lapenta emanating from your body.
I don't know how or where you obtained such a power, but... That makes you a very interesting specimen, $MyPCName$.
I would be very interested to see what you are capable of with even more powerful lapenshards.
As you already know, the Frontier Foundation's primary purpose is acquiring and regulating the lapenshards. But what does regulation entail, anyway?
I'd say that conducting research on the possible weaponization of lapenshards through the creation of a super-powered army falls under that umbrella.

Hehehe... What do you say, $MyPCName$? Why don't you think of this as another special assignment for the Foundation's favorite adventurer! Collect the lapenshards, use them to your heart's content, and let me study their effects on you!
There's no better way to learn about what different lapenshards can do than through trial and error, right? Here, why don't you try this one on for size and see what happens?
$MyPCName$, I'm sorry for not introducing myself sooner. I'm $npcName:11004032[gender:0]$, a Psion called to provide my expertise to the foundation.
Well, were you able to use the lapenshard I gave you? Tell the truth now!
Hehe. You didn't have any trouble did you?
Surely someone oozing with as much lapenta energy as you are can manage that little fragment.
Fine, don't tell me! However you decide to use the lapenshards, the Foundation is counting on you.
左右张望。
这里，这里！！你面前的书架！我就在里面！
继续听。
有个家伙把我放到了这里。 这里都是些粗鲁、暴躁的家伙！ 我可受不了整天和这些家伙在一起！
问需要我怎么做。
快把我从这里拿出去，放回原来的书架上。 丢了，那个书架应该上了锁。钥匙在<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000216$</font>那里。
怎么样了？
说书太重了，暂时放在这里了。
说只是路过。
什么放在这里…… 你把我狼狈地丢在了图书馆的地上。
问怎么又重新插到了书架上。
可恶的怪物又把我插到了这里！快把我带走。
别胡思乱想，快把我送回原来的书架。
怪物又把我插在了这里！ 嗯？你的背包已经满了！你为我先腾出点空间来！
我一刻都不想待在这个书架附近，快走吧。
哎呀，见到朋友们真高兴！哈哈哈。
问是否满意。
当然！总算回家了。 我的心情很激动！哈哈哈。
如果你要到<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000118$</font>去的话，我想拜托你一件事！
近卫队基地说储备的粮食不足，让我送点粮食过来。 但是我又不能把食物那样容易变质的东西装在包袱里，对吧？
我必须到附近的村子里去采购食物。 请你帮我告诉<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000157[gender:0]$</font>，说可能需要一些时间。
对了，<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000118$</font>有很多怪物…… 去的路上，能顺便帮我把怪物赶走吗？
怎么这么慢？还在干什么？
$npc:11000546[gender:0]$说要晚一点？真遗憾，不过这也是没办法的事。 我们基地也在想办法，一定可以有办法解决。
欢迎光临！需要结算吗？ 没买东西也没关系。 在这里可以随便逛逛，遇到了邻居就聊聊天什么的都可以。
哎呀，<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000244$</font>的库存量又不够了。 在老板知道之前，估计要用自己的钱给补上了。
问为什么会不足。
有职员看见是被$npc:21000013$偷偷拿走的。 因为它长得很凶，那个人没敢阻止他，只是装作没看见。
但搞笑的是据说那家伙虽然长得很凶，但心里紧张地 手一直在发抖，哈哈哈。 唉，要是有人能帮我把被<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000013$</font>偷走的<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000244$</font>找回来就好了……
跟老板说也没用。他反而会认为是我们干的。
谢谢你。丢失的东西全部找到了！！
以前看守公园的时候， 经常有人给我送饮料的。 也许是因为最近事态紧迫，现在很少有那样的人了。
我必须在这里守着公园，没时间去买饮料。 我可不是因为口渴，才跟你说这些的！ 更不是让你去免费买饮料给我喝。
问想喝什么。
$MyPCName$，你只要到$map:2000209$去帮我买一罐 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000245$</font>就行。 告诉<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000795[gender:1]$</font>是我让你去的，她就会免费送给你。
站在太阳底下，喉咙都要冒烟了。 真想来一罐$item:30000245$。
欢迎光临！我可以帮你结帐。
很多人过来买$item:30000245$。 看来冰箱里面得多放一些才行。
是$npc:11000352[gender:0]$派我来跑腿的。
哎呀，这可怎么办呢？ 老板说$npc:11000352[gender:0]$欠的钱太多， 不能再给他赊账了。
$npc:11000352[gender:0]$是会按时还款的优秀顾客， 不知道老板为什么突然会这样。
我知道这让你很为难， 但请你告诉<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000352[gender:0]$</font>，不能再继续赊账了。
这是老板的指示，我也没办法。
我买的饮料都可以装下一辆卡车了。而且钱我也按时付给他们了。 竟然会受到这种待遇！等工作结束之后，我要亲自去见见他们老板！
人们都去了附近的大型商场。 像我们这样的小店生意越来越难做了。
而且这里的气氛越来越阴森了。 到处都是苍蝇，客人们进来之后扭头就走。
我每天都在驱赶水果周围的苍蝇。 只要一不小心，它们就会聚集到水果周围。
那些苍蝇一定是在下水道下面安家了。 为了消灭苍蝇，我用药草配制出了杀虫剂。
把<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000246$</font>洒在商店附近的下水道下面， 这样苍蝇应该就不会再出现了。
有什么问题吗？
说弄丢了$item:30000246$。
说下水道很臭。
你把$item:30000246$掉在了地上。 被我捡了起来。
刚才你好像放在背包里了……你能看一看吗？ 哈哈，我说的没错吧？
你掉在了地上，被我捡到了。 但是你的背包已经满了，没地方放。
喷洒$item:30000246$之后，味道应该就会消失。
虽然苍蝇消失了，但生意并没有好转。 你就当我是拿它们出气吧。
我心情不好，别来烦我。 啊，等等！请你帮我个忙。
之前有个陌生人找到了我，让我帮他把一个背包藏起来。 他往我手里塞了一大把钱。 我仔细一看，那是我无法拒绝的巨款！
他也没确认我会藏在哪里，就急匆匆地消失了。 我一直把那个背包藏在容易藏的地方。 但是我越想越担心……
因为有的些怪物看见我把背包藏了起来。 要是那个背包另有主人，而且正在寻找的话， 那该怎么办呢？
所以我说， 为了不让消息传出去，最好封住怪物们的嘴。
问该怎么封嘴。
和新手做事就是麻烦。 还能怎么办？把它们干掉不就行了！
说怪物又没做错什么。
怪物本来就是个坏蛋。 就算不是因为这件事，也得从这个世界上消失才对！
不必有负罪感。 你又不是头一次对付怪物。干嘛这样？
你！我说的话，一定要帮我保密。 你帮了我的忙，就是共犯。
唉，浑身酸痛。 该死，不祥的预感一定不会有错。
问到底是怎么回事。
黑星会的人来找我，一张口就问背包在哪里。 我装作不知道，结果被打了一顿。 唉，牙齿好像都松了。
问有没有说出背包的下落。
我疯了吗？ 要是说出是我把背包藏起来了，也许我就没办法在这里和你说话了。 嗯，一定是有人告了密。难道，是你？
哎呀，先不管这个。我现在必须抹点药， <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000867[gender:0]$</font>那里一定有什么药，他对药草很感兴趣。 我现在行动不便，你帮我跑一趟吧。
眼睛是不是被打肿了？ 呸……我的眼睛本来就小！！
$npc:11000211[gender:0]$那个家伙，闯的祸也不止一次两次了。 他说需要治跌打损伤的药？我现在手上刚好没有……
药倒是马上可以做，但材料不够。 我暂时没办法离开，你能帮我去搜集一些材料吗？
说没问题。
不需要走很远就能搜集到。别担心。 你在$map:02000138$遇到过<font color="#ffd200">$npc:21000161$</font>吗？

问发生了什么事。

$npcName:11001292[gender:0]$只做我的食物， 幸好他没有中途歇业。

如果不是那家伙，我还能吃饱一点！
为了处理$npcName:11001294[gender:0]$那家伙的咒语，我忙得晕头转向。 但是，突然有个巨大的黑影笼罩了餐厅门口。
我一下子就紧张了起来，头发都快竖起来了。 然后……
开业第一天我就损失不小， 就只能以营业时间结束为由，把那两个客人赶走了。
但是那天，有一个客人先走了，另一个在结完账 后来厨房找到我。
然后他很开心地说非常好吃。 那时我感觉一整天的疲劳都消失了。 我看着那个客人走了出去。
他还转过身来，再次挥手并和我打招呼。 那时透过窗子洒下的月光，照在了他的手腕上。 我看到了他手腕上的花纹。
那和我手臂上的花纹相同。 他果然也是龙骑士。
没想到居然能以这种方式找到龙骑士。
<font color="#909090">（呵呵地笑着）</font> $npcName:11001294[gender:0]$的胃口一直很好。

$npcName:11001292[gender:0]$和我是在医院遇到的。 那时候我因为不明原因的疼痛，非常烦恼。

$npcName:11001292[gender:0]$听说了我的症状，立马抓着我的手臂把我带到了月光的湖旁边。 查看了我手臂上的花纹。

……哎？等下，找到了！这个，<font color="#ffd200">$map:03000145$</font> 数据中心…… 数据中心？嗯……什么意思？
我完全不明白你在说什么。
啊，反正这和$map:03000145$有关嘛。 $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$，我们去$map:03000145$吧。
灰狼！ 我之后会通过$npcName:11000610[gender:0]$再联系你，你先等着吧。
和$npcName:11001679[gender:0]$不一样的家伙……啊，想不起来名字了，爱丽？$npcName:11001687[gender:0]$？ 总之那些家伙去了$map:03000145$的$map:52000039$。
上头下命令让你也去汇合，你快点去找那些家伙吧。 那些家伙可能有危险！
快点去吧。
你怎么现在才来？ 算了，你来了就好！！！
$npcName:11001679[gender:0]$被怪物抓走了。 我们必须快点找到那家伙。
没时间磨蹭了。 快点跟我来。
我们要找到$npcName:11001679[gender:0]$！
呵呵…… 灰……灰狼……我没事……没事……
你……你去看看$npcName:11001687[gender:0]$那家伙怎么样了。
我……我也没事！谢谢你，<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>！ 看来<font color="#ffd200">灰狼</font>的外号不是白叫的。
我们不能再待在这里了。 你既然救了$npcName:11001679[gender:0]$，那就快点调查这里吧！
快点！
这件事太大了，由我们来调查有点不合适吧？ 如果要了解超链接的真相，那就得 潜入或者入侵超链接的中心吧？
看来我们只能调查到这里， 把至今为止的事情报告给老大。
灰狼，这里的调查就到此为止吧。
你没收到$npcName:11001674[gender:0]$或者$npcName:11001682[gender:0]$的联络吗？ 首领正在找你。 请你去$map:02000156$，见见老大吧。
听关于在$map:03000145$发生的所有事情。
我要调查超链接的本部。
超链接在制造机器人还是克隆体都不是我该知道的事情。 我能赚多少钱才是重要的。
超链接里有很多企业和个人的钱。 也就是说，这里面的利益关系错综复杂。
如果你轻率地捅了马蜂窝，那你不知道什么时候就死了。 你觉得我能让你做出损害我的利益的事情吗？
一开始让我调查超链接的人就是你啊。
是啊，调查就到这里吧。
你知道了你想知道的事情吗？
我可没允许你问问题！
嗯…… <font color="#909090">(似乎陷入了沉思。)</font>
我听说叫红披风的人似乎和超链接有关。 根据情报，王室近卫队正在追踪红披风， 你先帮助王室近卫队抓住他吧。
The knight captain was looking for you. It seemed urgent!
Hurry!
You're finally here. Good.
We've been trying to plan our next steps, but not everyone in our camp sees eye-to-eye.
Some of us want to hunt $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ down, but others have pointed out that we barely have enough troops to hold the $map:02000146$.
Of course, then there's the fact that $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ wasn't acting alone. He still has his spies in Dark Wind and the guard. Getting rid of them has to be our first priority.
But I don't know who among my own people we can trust... so my only option is to place this operation in your hands.
I'll get those spies.
I'm glad to hear it. Now, the Royal Guard has taken an interest in the $map:02000146$...
Speak with $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ and see if he has any guidance on where to start.
There's little time to waste!
What is it?
I'm here to find $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies.
That's great. I can't think of anyone better for the job.
Between $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s betrayal and the caravan attack, someone must have left behind some sort of evidence.
I'd start with either of those leads.
Have you searched $map:52000073$?
My $npcName:11001912[gender:0]$ is out at $map:52000073$ as we speak.
I'll join up with him, then.
If you leave now, you should be able to catch him.
There's little time to waste!
Ah, the great $MyPCName$! How may I help you?
I'm looking into $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s people.
Yes, yes, of course. I was just about to begin my examination of the room.
How shall we proceed?
Why don't we split the room into sections?
Very good. I shall begin my search near the door.
I'll look near the door.
Have you found something?
I found this $item:30000599$.
May I see?
This is a blueprint of the building. But look here! There's a gap in the floor plan... A hidden room, perhaps?
There's a gap in the floor plan... A hidden room, perhaps?
Just as expected. What did you find?
I found this $item:30000600$.
The ashes on this file are still fresh. Someone was here recently...
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s minions are trying to get rid of the evidence. It seems we came here too late...
Let's see who else has been here.
$npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ is in charge of security. We might try asking him.
I suspect $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ would know who else has been here.
You need something?
Has anyone else been here recently?
Just you and the $npcName:11001912[gender:0]$.
What do you know about the secret room upstairs?
Secret what now? Never heard of it!
I-I swear I knew nothing! If I knew about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s plot, I'd have reported it!
I hardly ever got to set foot in $map:52000073$. Of course I didn't know about any secret hidey holes...
I-I'm just a common member of Dark Wind. Working hard to keep the city safe. That's all!
I've got nothing to do with this.
What did $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$ say?
He says he's innocent.
I see...
<font color="#909090">(He's piecing together the $item:30000600$.)</font> Most interesting... If I've got these bits in the right order, it's a hit list. You and $npcName:11000064$ are on here...
Here it says something about... the $map:02000310$? But the bits after this have been burnt away.
The $map:02000310$... That's where $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ is being held!
That's right! And it's $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ who provided the evidence we needed to go after $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
I need to get to the $map:02000310$.
Quite right!
You must hurry.
You... you saved my life...
They got $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. The winged one... and minions...
I overheard them talking. They were heading to $map:02000134$.
If you hurry, you might still catch them.
Hurry!
<font color="#909090">(It seems that you were too late.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ may also be in danger.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ may also be in danger.)</font>
How goes the hunt for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies?
(Tell him about the hunt thus far.)
I see...
But why are you here?
Do you know where $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is?
$npc:11000064[gender:0]$ is in the $map:52000074$ with $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. Did you need him for something?
He may be $npcName:11000044$'s next target.
You may be right.
But $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ isn't the only target, is he?
Don't worry. We won't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s goons get near $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
But you're sure that $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ still has spies in Dark Wind? What a pain.
We need to talk.
This is serious.
I was hoping it was just a rumor. Our agents don't know who they can trust anymore.
For all I know, the spies themselves could be spreading the rumor to demoralize us.
$npc:11000076$ thinks Dark Wind needs a new captain to give us direction. He suggested $npc:11000064[gender:0]$.
True, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is Captain $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s rightful successor... but we've been hunting him for a long time. It's hard to view him as a friend, even now.
It's a tough situation.
We've got to learn how to trust each other again. It would be good for Dark Wind to have a captain we can put our faith in.
I think $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is a fine choice. Of course, we should find out if he actually wants the job first.
That's a good idea.
I'm glad you think so. Why don't you go ask $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ for me?
Talk to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
I wish $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would accept the reality of the situation... Sorry, what's the matter?
Dark Wind needs a new captain.
And you want to know if I'm up for the job. Great. If you ask me, $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ would make a much better captain.
Sure, he left Dark Wind to form Humblis, but he's spent plenty of time working with the members of both groups.
If you're serious about this, then go speak with $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.
I'll go see what he thinks.
Thanks. To be honest, I'm not ready to do anything like lead Dark Wind. Not until I've finished with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
I know where my focus belongs.
Good timing. There's something we need to—Hold on. You look too eager. What's up?
How would you feel about leading Dark Wind?
I left Dark Wind because $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ was framed and $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ was a tyrant. Now that that's done with, I wouldn't mind going back...
But I never thought about becoming the boss. If the others want me in charge, then I'll think about it.
Now, on to other business. You aren't the only one who's been looking for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies. And Humblis, I'm pleased to say, has delivered.
Some of the traitors have vanished into the woodwork, but there's a group of them still in Dark Wind. As it turns out, you're the next target on their list.
I thought that might be the case.
So, how do you feel about being used for bait?
What's the plan?
$npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ can fill you in.
$npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ can fill you in.
You know the guy they've got working security at Dark Wind headquarters? $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$? It turns out he's an incurable blabbermouth.
We can use that mouth of his to our advantage! We'll let slip that you're investigating their secret hideout—alone—and we'll simply wait for word to reach $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies.
They know you're no pushover, so they'll come to the $map:52000070$ in force. Of course, Humblis will be lying in wait...
It's your time to shine. Why don't you have a little "chat" with $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$?
Go meet with $npcName:11000215[gender:0]$.
How did your chat go?
He bought it.
Good! I bet he's told half of Dark Wind by now.
We've waited long enough. They're probably waiting to ambush you in the $map:52000070$. Don't worry, Humblis has your back.
I'm not worried.
Yeah, me neither! You better get to the $map:52000070$.
This plan better work...
So, in the secret room... that was hidden behind a secret entrance... there was a second secret door?
Anyway, it all worked out in the end. A lesser $male:man,female:woman$ wouldn't have survived that.
I'll make sure $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies get a nice, cozy jail cell to share. It's a shame Dark Wind couldn't take care of this themselves...
We need to help Dark Wind regroup.
I'll give this whole "captain" business some thought. In the meantime, there's no need for Humblis anymore, so me and mine will be rejoining Dark Wind.
I'll talk to $npc:11000119[gender:0]$. You let your friends know that their spy troubles are over.
Don't keep them waiting.
How's the investigation going?
Humblis captured $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies.
That's good news!
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ will want to hear about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s spies. Why don't you deliver the news yourself?
It's about time we had some good news.
You have something to report?
(Tell him what happened so far.)
If I know $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$, he's already decided to do it.
And I'm glad that his spies are gone, but $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is still out there.
The forces of darkness have infiltrated every corner of Maple World. Dark Wind only represented a fraction of their power.
$MyPCName$, we have an emergency!
This is bad.
$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ has disappeared. A witness says that she wasn't alone...
And the person who was with her... The witnesses described the same man who took $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.

If $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ really has been kidnapped, then it's surely a trap to lure out $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. I tried to tell him as much, but he wouldn't listen. He's already taken off to save her.
I don't have time to muster my forces. Go ahead of my knights and give $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ some backup.
One of the witnesses say a new passageway to the Land of Darkness opened up. That's where $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ was headed.
Hurry. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ needs all the help he can get.
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. That... that demon was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. And $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ was with him!
What happened to him? And why is $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ just going along with him?
I was ready to fight $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ stopped me.
She told me not to follow her, then disappeared into the Land of Darkness. $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... He must have tricked her somehow!
Wait...

You have to promise not to tell anyone about this. The others will think that $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ defected, but I know that can't be true. And if they see her with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$...
We can't let anyone send a search party, either. If anyone asks, tell them... I don't know! Tell them she went on a vacation!
I'm asking a lot, but I need you to trust me.
Well?
$npcName:11000523[gender:1]$ went on a... vacation.
A vacation.
So there's no need to send any search parties!
Hm. If you say she's safe, I suppose that's good enough for me.
Hey, where's $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
We split up. He isn't back yet?
No. I kinda need to talk with him and $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ about picking a new leader for Dark Wind.
I'll go find him for you.
That'd be great. The sooner we can get Dark Wind on its feet, the better.
We gotta pick a new leader soon...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ isn't here.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Where did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ go? If anyone knows the answer, it would be $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Where did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ go? If anyone knows the answer, it would be $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$.)</font>
There's no doubt in my mind. That idiot went into the Land of Darkness to find $npcName:11000523[gender:1]$.
He's trying to keep you safe by leaving you behind. I'll get my people together and look for him.
Don't worry about this. I'll loop $npcName:11000266[gender:0]$ in on the situation.
I think this situation warrants a more... unconventional approach.
I think this situation warrants a more... unconventional approach.
It won't take long for the others to notice that $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s missing. Our new friends will start to talk.
I'll do my best to keep our search on the down-low, but Humblis isn't a thing anymore. It's hard to move people around when the other half of Dark Wind is watching you.
Let me guess. You want me to lead the search.
You got it.
I don't use her often, but I know someone who has proven useful in cases like this. Her methods are... eccentric.
Seek her out at the $map:03000103$. You'll know her when you see her.
Head to the $map:03000103$.
You're looking for someone, aren't you? Yes, I can see him. I can help you find your little blond friend... for a price.
I've been itching for some of my special potion, yes? But the dark magic is so thick in the air, I've been wallowing in it. I'm much, much too relaxed to move now.
Bring me the ingredients for my potion, and I will show you the one you seek. A fair bargain, no?
We have a deal.
Good, good! Bring me sharp $itemPlural:30000614$, a wriggly pile of $itemPlural:30000615$, and fluttery $itemPlural:30000616$!
Bring me my ingredients, child!
Fine, fine, yes. These are very good.
The one you seek went where mortals should not tread. That place is dangerous, and dripping in delicious shadows! Will you join him?
I have no choice.
The fool has foolish friends! The darkness will swallow you alive, child. But if it's what you want, I'll be happy to send you to your doom!
Ready to throw your life away? I am happy to send you back to the $map:52000076$.
That's right.
No.
You're as reckless as he is. Who am I to deny you your doom?
Yes, cower. No need to die so young...
The monsters... $map:02000001$...!
This is bad...
I want to give you my thanks. Not just on my own behalf, but on behalf of all of the guards. Without your help, we would have lost $map:02000001$.
Thank you for your help.
Like the empress said, we need to prepare a counter attack. I hope we can count on you.
How are you holding up?
I stand as a pillar of the empire. I'll mourn the dead in my own time, but for now, it's my job to set an example for my men.
Goldus Bank, shmoldus bank. You'd think a fancy place like this would have a sturdier safe.
Let's clean this place out before the cops get here!
Grab all the loot you can!
Necklaces are nice. Diamonds are ace. But nothing beats cold, hard cash.
Well now, aren't you in a chipper mood today?
I'm just happy to see your smiling face. <font color="#909090">(You slide a tall stack of mesos to her.)</font>
And you always know just how to make me smile. My darling granddaughter will eat good tonight.
On that note, I better go spread the wealth, eh?
We're so lucky to have you.
Never let it be said that we don't look out for our own here.
If we don't, who will? Consider this a tax refund.
Well, when you put it that way...
You must hurry to the forward camp, $MyPCName$. There are wounded...
It's $npc:11003328$'s scouting party. They came limping back into camp...
Quickly, you must tend to the wounded!
Oooh...
How do you feel? Is that better?
Ugh... My...
Zzz...
It looks like I have to clean this place up myself. Again.
Zzz...
Yaaawn! What a good nap... Why'd you have to go and wake me up?
I picked up the trash. It's your turn to get the archery range set up.
Nah. Don't feel like it.
But $npcName:11003380[gender:1]$ herself said we all have to do it!
Hey, I've got a great idea. Why don't you do it and tell her I did?
It's not like I don't want to help you or anything. I'm just feeling stiff. Need to stretch out those joints before I get out of bed, you know?
But the captain said...
Fine, fine, I'll do it. Guess I'll be too tired later to show you that archery trick we were talking about...
Oh well. I guess you didn't really want to learn it, after all...
N-no! You rest up. I'll get everything set up!
That's more like it. Wake me up when you're done, all right?
But what if $npcName:11003380[gender:1]$ sees you sleeping in?
Yeah, yeah, like I'm scared of my little sister. Don't sweat it.
I'm trying to get some shut-eye here.
Zzz...
Ugh... I couldn't sleep last night, and now... I feel...
Just hold on. I'll get you back to the training yard. Surely someone there can save you!
Huff... Huff...
Return to first position, everyone!
P-please, brother! You must help me! I think my friend... he's going to...!
Eh? You talking to me?
Yes. One of the other squires is extremely ill. If he isn't treated, I'm afraid he might...
You want something from me. Of course. Not like I got anything better to do.
<FONT color='#909090'>(He narrows his eyes at you and gives an annoyed sigh.)</FONT>
Problem is, healing magic isn't exactly my... thing. I'm sure $npcName:11003330[gender:1]$ would just loooove to help, though!
There's no time. Please, hurry! This way!
Twist my arm, why don't ya! I mean... As you wish, my $male:brother,female:sister$.

<font color="#909090">(Huh, a letter from $npcName:11001540$. It's been a while. According to this, he's found something interesting and he wants to meet. Well, it's been a while since you paid a visit to your old stomping grounds...)</font>
Hey! Over here! I was worried you might've gotten lost.
Hey! Over here! I was worried you might've gotten lost.
That's pretty funny. This is my home turf, pal. I know this place like the back of my hand. I could tell you how many telephone poles there are.
In your letter you said something about coming across something interesting. What did you mean?
You realize that these days nothing sparks my interest unless it's worth at least 100 million on the Black Market, right?
Yeah, sure, you're a reaaaal big shot. But seriously, I brought you here to show you something important. Let's talk inside.
Are you out of your mind? You know what this place is, don't you?
This is...
Haha. Yeah, along time ago maybe. This place used to be a Dark Wind hideout. They say even wild monsters kept their distance out of fear.
Then what could possibly be so important that you think I'm going in there?
Chill out. This place has been abandoned for ages. It's our hideout now.
..."Our?" What are you talking about?
Did you actually meet some people willing to tolerate you? I didn't think I'd ever see you with friends in my lifetime.
Shut up... Let's go inside. I have something to show you.
It'd better be good, considering how much you've talked it up!
Hah. Just try not to have a heart attack, all right?
$npcName:11003272[gender:0]$... $npcName:11003273[gender:1]$!
$npcName:11003272[gender:0]$... $npcName:11003273[gender:1]$!
$npcName:11003272[gender:0]$... $npcName:11003273[gender:1]$! You're... how?!
Puhaha! You should see the look on your face.
Hehe... It's almost like you saw a ghost or something.
Hey, $MyPCName$. Long time no see. How've you been?
That Jonathan... I guess he really did find something interesting. I can't believe you're both here...
...Something interesting? What do you mean?
Hey!
Something's different about you, $MyPCName$. You seem more... Intense.
That's what I was going to say!
Hah. Did I get tougher? Is that what you're trying to say? Yes, yes, I am 1200% more awesome now. A whole lot's happened since I saw you guys. Shall I regale you with tales of my heroism?
Err... I was just going to ask if you got a haircut or something.
...Hahahaha! Oh you.
Hey, did you have a run-in with $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ too?! When we came to, we couldn't help but worry if he'd gotten to you.
I think I'm the one who should be asking the questions here. After what $npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ said, I thought you guys were dead!
$npcName:11001927[gender:0]$ tried to take them out, but he botched the job.

When I found them they were both pretty cut up, but they managed to pull through. After they recovered we roamed around a bit, trying to steer clear of Blackstar. Eventually we ended up here. Thanks to these guys I'm basically a fugitive now...
...Hey, are you listening?
Hey! Seeing as we're all together again, I think this calls for a little celebration!
Sigh...
I know you've got important hero-y stuff to do, but why don't you just take a load off for bit?
I know you've got important hero-y stuff to do, but why don't you just take a load off for bit?
Yeah! Let's raid the juice bar! I know you've been busy with all your hero stuff recently, but you've gotta take a break now and then to celebrate the little things!
$npcName:11003273[gender:1]$... Do you realize who you're talking to?
Let's get fruit-faced!
Hey, guys, I don't know how long that stuff's been sitting on the shelf...
Don't be such a partypooper, juice doesn't go bad! Besides, a day like this is the perfect time to get our drank on. No one's leaving here 'til that juice is gone!
C'mon Jonathan. Get over here and have a seat! I'm guessing you haven't partied with these guys before. I'll tell you right now, they can handle their sugar. So don't hurt yourself trying to keep up.
Sigh... You guys are unbelievable.
They're both out cold...
They're both out cold...
They're both completely passed out... Talk about a sugar crash.
They haven't changed a bit! I can't believe we really made it through all that juice. The bottles are empty.

I could barely keep up—I'm still super jittery here... I've gotta tell you, Jonathan. You've gotta be careful when you hit the juice with these ones. Sometimes, they scare me more than the forces of darkness.
...$MyPCName$.
While they're out, there's something I need to talk to you about. Follow me.
<font color="#909090">(Why's he so serious all of the sudden?)</font>
Over here.
I've heard a lot of things since you've been gone.
I've heard a lot of things since you've been gone.
I've heard a lot of things since you've been gone. Information you'd be quite interested to hear.
Take a look at this picture. <font color="#909090">(He shows you a photograph of a young man exchanging colorful crystals for an impressive amount of cash.)</font>
Wait a sec... That's...!
$npcName:11001927[gender:0]$!
This is what I called you here to talk about. Do you happen to recognize those crystals he's holding?

It is good to see you again, my loyal subject.
I've finally received news from one of our scouting parties. My agents have discovered the source of my earlier foreboding deep within the Land of Darkness.
Followers of the ancient and powerful Demon King have lifted the earth and bent space itself, revealing deep pockets of darkness that we didn't even know existed.
New enemies are coming from this darkness. The average adventurer stands no chance against such monsters...
But we can't afford to ignore the darkness. Not anymore. Someone needs to face the enemy head on and uncover their plot.
Who is this new Penumbran Host? What are they after? $MyPCName$, only a hero of your caliber could hope at succeeding in such a task.

Thank you for taking this seriously, as always. I want you to have this. You will need it to overcome the darkness.
It's been too long. How have you been?
I've heard some interesting rumors that might interest you. Something that could increase your power significantly. Do you want to learn more?
I've heard some interesting rumors that might interest you. Something that could increase your power significantly. Do you want to learn more?

It seems there are gemstones that you can place in your equipment to make it more powerful. These gemstones vary in color and shape, which will tell you what kind of bonuses the gemstone will give you.
Some gemstones can be upgraded to grant exceptional power. You'll need gemstone motes to do so, which you can get by dismantling your unneeded gemstones.
But you can't use gemstones on every piece of equipment! Only gear with sockets have room for gemstones. It may be challenging to find such equipment...
There's still so much we don't know about gemstones. If you happen to find any, please try them out and let me know what you find!
Oh, here is an item with a gemstone slot and a spare gemstone. Try it for yourself. It's sure to be a good experience!

关于这里的传闻越传越广，许多人前赴后继地 来挑战，但是没人能解开这里的秘密。 但是仍然有传闻说第一个发现这里的巴巴依旧把这里 用作埋藏自己发现的宝物的仓库。
即使每天都在挖掘用任何工具都无法摧毁的岩石缝隙， 巴巴的鼻子还是湿润又柔软，没有一点伤口。

询问不应该派遣近卫队进行调查吗。
没错，不过去那里调查需要借助魔法的力量， 所以我觉得最好是麻烦一下$map:02000023$的$npc:11000031[gender:0]$ ，我也正因此在考虑 要不要拜托女王呢……
我就想到了$MyPCName$你。 你对于事件的感觉很敏锐，不管调查什么都能很快找到线索， 战斗能力也很强，因此无论发生什么都可以去应对。
<font color="#909090">（这似乎是要使唤我的意思啊……）</font>
我想拜托你去调查$map:02000079$，不知道你愿不愿意。 请你去查看一下那里究竟发生了什么， 那里是不是真的有火灾产生的原因。 如果你能发现并消除危险因素就更好了。拜托你了。
我想拜托你去调查$map:02000079$，不知道你愿不愿意。 请你去查看一下那里究竟发生了什么， 那里是不是真的有火灾产生的原因。 如果你能发现并消除危险因素就更好了。拜托你了。
$MyPCName$，你好。 你已经去了$map:02000079$吗？
叙述关于那里发生的$npc:23100041[gender:0]$的事情。
是吗……？ 真是发生了很多难以断定真假的事情啊。 那个东西怎么样了？
说已经消灭了。
撒谎说逃跑了。
果然，$MyPCName$你真是优秀的战士。 辛苦你了。
……原来你也会开这种玩笑啊，$MyPCName$。 像你这样的人肯定不会对这种事情坐视不理的。 我现在已经多少对你有些了解了。
<font color="#909090">（我似乎被看穿了，感觉很奇怪。）</font>
在黑风发生了那样的事情，这个城市还是没有任何改变…… 我想让更多人知道这种不合理的现实。 喂，你也是这么想的吗？
我听说<font color="#ffd200">冒险岛电视台教育部的$npc:11001888[gender:1]$</font>是个很有信念的人。 如果可以，你能请她去对$map:02000100$市政府前的示威队 进行采访报道吗？ 我没办法亲自出面……拜托你了。
她应该就在电视台所在的<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000164$</font>附近。
她应该就在电视台所在的<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000164$</font>附近。
嗯？你是谁……你找我有事吗……？
询问对方是不是<font color="#ffd200">冒险岛电视台教育部的$npc:11001888[gender:1]$</font>。
嗯……是的。应该没有人和我同名， 不过我现在不在教育部，在综艺局。
询问是否可以对$map:02000100$的人权问题进行取材。
啊。取材啊…… 你是获得了其他人的信息吗？现在我……那个……
叙述关于$map:02000100$市政府前的示威队的事情。
虽然很遗憾……但是我似乎没什么能做的。 我因为不听从教育部长的指示，被突然调到综艺局…… 现在我已经无法接触到时事调查节目或者纪录片了。
首先……我会告诉当年与我一同在教育部同组工作的$npc:11001192[gender:0]$， 让他去采访报道$map:02000100$市政府前示威队的事情。 虽然我不想错过这么重要的举报……不过我也没办法，真是遗憾啊。
谢谢你能告诉我这件事，$MyPCName$。
那个……我可以委托你一件事吗？ 强壮的体力，乐于助人的善心，还有 充满个性的外貌……！我需要像<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$这样的人的</font>帮助。
询问发生了什么事。
你知道冒险岛电视台代表长寿节目<font color="#ffd200">惊奇TV，真吓人！</font>吗？ 因为1次节目中要展现许多片段，拍摄量 非常多。本来预约拍摄场地就很麻烦，拍摄量又大，时间紧急， 摄影导演经常发火。
但是……今天本来要拍摄的演员突然联系不上了。 拍摄场地的预约时间已经没剩多少了，摄影导演一直在等着…… 再这么下去综艺局就要炒我的鱿鱼了……
询问是不是需要演员。
对，没错。你看起来体力也不错， 你想<font color="#ffd200">出演</font>我们的节目吗？ 当然，<font color="#ffd200">演出费</font>是不会少的。
我对于演技没什么自信啊。
这个你就不用担心了，我们的摄影导演是业界精英。 你只要按照他说的去做，剩下靠编辑就行了。 我在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000266$</font>的<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000380$</font>等你哦！
只要按照摄影导演说的去做就行，非常简单！ 既能成为演员，还能获得演出费。这个兼职很不错吧？ 我在<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000266$</font>的<font color="#ffd200">$map:02000380$</font>等你哦！
$MyPCName$，你来啦！ 电视台已经看过拍下来的成品了，现在正在过来的路上， 看样子拍得很好。就连摄影指导都很满意。
要是你哪天又想参加拍摄了，欢迎随时来 $map:02000380$，$MyPCName$！
Excuse me! I've been sent to ask you to see the empress. She's waiting for you at $map:52000087$.
Excuse me! I've been sent to ask you to see the empress. She's waiting for you at $map:52000087$.
I've been waiting for you, $MyPCName$.
In these troubling times, we've come to rely on your wisdom and courage more and more. That's why I've called you here. I want your advice.

So far, none of our scouting missions have uncovered any information about $npc:11001851[gender:1]$ and her forces of darkness. I'd put more people on the investigation, but my army is busy securing and repairing $map:02000001$.
But you... you are astonishingly resourceful. Do you have any suggestions for how we could proceed?
We should broaden our search.
Have you tried hiring freelancers?
You're right, of course. We should be searching far beyond the borders of $map:02000001$, but we still have a problem with manpower...
We could ask sailors and explorers for help.
I've given that some thought, but it's dangerous work. It would be difficult to ensure that we only hire people who are up to the task, and I won't send unprepared novices to their doom.
We could ask sailors and explorers for help.
Explorers! Of course! They've seen more of Maple World than anyone else. It's possible they've encountered signs of the darkness in their travels.
I'll check in with the sailors at $map:02000062$.
Very good. I leave this in your capable hands, $MyPCName$.
I'm so very glad I asked for your thoughts on this matter. I hope your meeting in $map:02000062$ goes well.
Well, if it isn't $MyPCName$. You've got a reputation for yourself, you know.
You're looking pretty fit. Have you ever considered joining the Adventurer's Guild?
I'm actually here on business.
Well, I am an adventurer...
All right. How can I help?
I've seen captains with twenty years at sea who were more green than you. I think you'd fit right in. Now, about your membership dues...
I'm actually here on business.
You're looking pretty fit. Have you ever considered joining the Adventurer's Guild?
It's the life of a sailor for me! Row the oars! Put your backs into it! <font color="#909090">(He's humming to himself...)</font>
Ahem! Excuse me.
Ah! When did you get here?
It's the life of a sailor for me! Row the oars! Put your backs into it! <font color="#909090">(He's humming to himself...)</font>
Ahem! Excuse me.
Ah! When did you get here?
It's the life of a sailor for me! Row the oars! Put your backs into it! <font color="#909090">(He's humming to himself...)</font>
Ahem! Excuse me.
Ah! When did you get here?
All kinds of rumors make their way here. This is a hub for explorers and adventurers, after all. So, ask me your questions.
Have you heard anything about the forces of darkness?
Of course I have! Did you know that they attacked both $map:02000001$ and $map:02000100$? That's some pretty fresh information right there.
You don't say. Have you anything about $npcName:11001851[gender:1]$?
I'm sure I heard that name before. Isn't $npcName:11001851[gender:1]$ the one who led the attack on the caravan some time ago?

Well, it sounds like you already know more about this than I do. But you aren't out of luck just yet. It turns out that the world's greatest explorer, $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$, is in town. I bet he knows something.
Where is this $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$?
He's in the $map:52000095$, next room over. You can visit him if you want, just... don't do anything to upset him. His ship was sunk by pirates, and he's still recovering.
$npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ is in the $map:52000095$, next room over. You can visit him if you want, just... don't do anything to upset him. His ship was sunk by pirates, and he's still recovering.
M-my ship... no...! <font color="#909090">(He's trembling in his sleep.)</font>
Wake up, $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. You're having a nightmare!
Ah! Oh... Oh, it was just a dream...
Thanks for waking me. Better to be awake and in pain then reliving those memories... So, what can I do for you?
Have you seen the forces of darkness in your journeys?
I've seen lots of strange and dark things. Can you be a little more specific?
(Tell him about $npcName:11001851[gender:1]$.)
I can't say I know the name. Sorry I couldn't be... Now, wait a minute. There is one thing, but it may not be helpful...
What is it?

There's a good friend of mine, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$. She's a lovely lady—well, siren, if I'm being specific—who lives on $map:02000391$. Last time I was out her way, she told me a great disaster was looming over Maple World.
I wanted to ask her more, but I had to set sail before low tide. I promised I'd be back soon... and the very next day, pirates sunk my ship. I've been holed up here licking my wounds ever since.
Sirens have a strange power. The ocean speaks to them. These forces of darkness you mentioned... Could be that they're the ones who cause the disaster in $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$'s prophecy.
I'd like to meet this $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$.
The sea route to $map:02000391$ isn't exactly straightforward. Even if you got there, the sirens don't exactly have a glowing opinion of humans. If only I could go with you...
There's got to be a way for me to meet her.

Well... Take this compass. Show it to $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ and tell her you're my friend. She'll help you get along with the others. As for actually getting to $map:02000391$, you'll need $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$'s help.
$npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ used to be $npc:23000015$'s navigator, but he gave up the pirating lifestyle. Now he's in hiding somewhere in $map:02000182$. Tell him I sent you.
Thanks for all of your help.
Don't mention it. To tell the truth, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$'s words have been weighing on me. If you can help stop this disaster, then I wish you all the luck in the world.
$npc:11003082[gender:0]$ is in hiding somewhere in $map:02000182$. Tell him I sent you. He'll get you to $map:02000391$.
<font color="#909090">(This log cabin looks suspicious. You hear something drop inside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Go inside the cabin. $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ might be inside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Go inside the cabin. $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ might be inside.)</font>
You... you saved me, stranger!
Are you $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$?
Yes, but whatever it is, I didn't do it! And I got no money, so don't bother robbing me, neither!
Relax! I'm $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s friend.
$npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ sent you! I heard he got sunk. Glad to hear he's still kicking around.

I know the pirate that scuttled $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. He thinks $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ is real pretty, but $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ only talks to $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. This made him real mad...
Who is he?
$npc:23000015$! Vicious, bad, mean! He sent his men to $map:02000391$ to drag $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ away!
We have to help her!
Don't be crazy! Pirates are strong. And plenty. $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ can take care of herself. And if not... she has a real mean sister!
Even if she doesn't need my help, I need hers.
What'd I just say about being crazy? I tried telling her what happened to $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$, I barely got out of $map:02000391$ alive. My ship's all tore up now...
If we go now, pirates attack us, and we sink. Glub glub glub.
Get ready to sail. In the meantime, I'll get rid of the pirates.
Fine! But you help, too. Get $itemPlural:30000725$ from $npcPlural:21000232[gender:0]$. Need to keep ship ship-shape! The things on the ship are not enough. I need more.
<font color="#909090">(Why can't anyone ever just say, "Sure, hop on my boat?")</font>
Beat up pirates in $map:02000182$. Get $itemPlural:30000725$. Do this, then we worry about surviving the trip...
Beat up pirates in $map:02000182$. Get $itemPlural:30000725$. Do this, then we worry about surviving the trip...
This is good. Enough to get us through if we sink again. While you were gone, I fixed up ship. Good to go!
We sail to $map:02000391$ when you're ready.
There'll be lots of pirates at $map:02000391$. Hope you get to $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ in one piece.
You aren't coming?
I steer the ship. That's plenty! The rest is up to you.
What's wrong? You get lost?
Where do I go to board the ship?
Outside cabin. There's the boat. Walk through the black door. Or I can push you through it!
You live!
$npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ showed up... She's real scary...
What did she say?
She wants you to come to $map:02000388$. Lots of pirates. Wants to steal their ship.
Why don't they use your ship?
Seas too rough there. My ship will sink. Needs a bigger ship. But this is too much! $npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ just wants to teach a lesson for flirting with $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$!
Well, it's not a bad plan.
You're scary, too! Do what you want. I'm not going.
Where is $map:02000388$?
$map:02000063$. In cave, behind waterfall. Good luck...
$map:02000388$ is in $map:02000063$. In cave, behind waterfall. Good luck...
And where is that?
$npcName:24003001[gender:1]$ said you'd get lost. Gave me a charm. It will make you dizzy, but you'll get there.
$npcName:24002931$... is agitated. But in time, he will grow calm again, thanks to you.
Clear away these mists and let us parley.
Let's go.
What is it we're doing here?
O great waves, lend us your strength! Sweep away these dark mists!
I shall use sea magic to cleanse this place of evil mists. Then it will be safe to speak with $npcName:24002931$. Shall we begin?
Let's go.
Clear away these mists and let us parley.
Let's go.
What is it we're doing here?
O great waves, lend us your strength! Sweep away these dark mists!
I shall use sea magic to cleanse this place of evil mists. Then it will be safe to speak with $npcName:24002931$. Shall we begin?
Let's go.
I can smell the sea on you. Did you find what you were after?
I... found $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s friend.
See, I knew he would help you!
<font color="#909090">(The vision $npcName:24002931$ showed you... The great disaster...)</font>
You don't mind if I go around telling everyone you're an honorary member of the Adventurer's Guild, do you? We could use the buzz!
<font color="#909090">(The other divine creatures... The Mage of Light...)</font>
Hold on, let me get my camera. I'm going to get your picture and post it on... Um, $MyPCName$? Are you listening?
<font color="#909090">(What does it mean? You need to contemplate this...)</font>
Helloooooo? Maple World to $MyPCName$!
Did you get hit in the head or something? You're totally spacing out.
I'm fine. How's $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ holding up?
Better, but still in no shape to get out of bed. He's still in the $map:52000095$ if you want to check in on him.
I think $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ is getting better, but he's still in no shape to get out of bed. He's still in the $map:52000095$ if you want to check in on him.

I've been counting the minutes 'til your return! Not much else to do in here, after all. Did $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$ give you a lift? How is $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$? Did she tell you about the looming disaster?
Not so fast! One question at a time, please.
Right, right! I'm used to finding answers for myself. Feels strange, relying on someone else to tell me what's going on... Okay, tell me how it went.
$npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ introduced me to her friend $npcName:24002931$.
You met $npcName:24002931$? The $npcName:24002931$?! That's the guardian of the sea! Do you know what any sailor worth his salt would give to be in your shoes?!
What did you two talk about? Was it what you were looking for? They say there's nothing $npcName:24002931$ doesn't know.
It... wasn't what I was looking for.
Oh. Well, that's too bad. You should've asked for winning lottery numbers instead, I suppose...
Also, $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ says you need to get better so you can visit again.
I'll do my best. $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ is a pal, a real pal. But how big was $npcName:24002931$, anyway? I wonder if she'll let me meet him someday...
A real pal, huh? $npcName:24003002[gender:1]$ will be disappointed...
What was that? Sorry, I think I got overexcited. I better get some rest... Thanks for letting me live vicariously through you, even if just for a little bit.
I've had a lot of time to look back on my life. And... I feel sad. If I had a strong friend like you, just think of all the amazing new places I could have discovered.
We should go adventuring together when you're better.
Count on it! We do that, and I'll put your name in the next edition of $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s World Tour!
Well, I'd better be on my way.
Of course, of course. Official business and all that. Sorry you didn't find what you want, but I'm glad we got the chance to meet.
Of course, of course. Official business and all that. Sorry you didn't find what you want, but I'm glad we got the chance to meet.
I'm pleased to see you. Did you learn anything new about our enemies?
I didn't find anything about the forces of darkness.
That's unfortunate. My own people have been busy repairing the damage from the last battle...
<font color="#909090">(The empress was definitely in $npcName:24002931$'s vision...)</font>
All we can do is keep searching. I have faith that we'll find some new evidence soon.
<font color="#909090">(But it was just a vision. You must proceed carefully.)</font>
I'll contact you the moment we have new information, of course.
<font color="#909090">(You can't tell anyone for now. Certainly not the empress.)</font>
Thank you for always doing your best, $MyPCName$.
I have a new mission for you, $MyPCName$. In fact, you were requested by name.
$npc:11000076[gender:0]$ sent a report that the forces of darkness have been sighted in the tundra of northern Victoria Island. He would like your help in assessing the situation.
I'm inclined to agree with him. $MyPCName$, will you help $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ in hunting down the forces of darkness?
You know I will.
Are we sure it's really them this time?
Thank you. $npc:11000076[gender:0]$ has set up a $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$.
$npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ witnessed it with his own eyes. I'm sure his report is accurate—but he's not used to fighting in the snow.
I'll give him some backup, then.
$npc:11000076[gender:0]$ has set up a $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$. I'm counting on both of you to track down the forces of darkness.
I see you received my summons!
Your arm is hurt.
Ah... It's just a scratch. Anyway, thanks for coming.
My men are in sorry shape. We aren't trained for arctic combat, and we took a beating in our last battle. We need to regroup, but I don't want to risk losing the trail. That's why you're here.
What happened, exactly?
We were scouting out the $map:02000260$ after hearing some suspicious rumblings, and we encountered monsters in a hidden cave. We were about to pursue, but...
But?
He appeared from nowhere. I don't know who he is, but he attacked both the monsters and my soldiers, demanding that no one interfere in his fight. The way he wielded that sword...
I'm not sure where his allegiance lies. He didn't seriously injure any of my men, and it was clear that he was no friend to the forces of darkness...
Is that how your arm got hurt?
It is. Even the slightest wound can turn deadly in this cold, so I need to stay here and make sure my men are attended to. But while we're stuck here, our latest clue is getting away...
I'll check out this cave of yours.
I knew I could count on you. The ice cave is hidden behind some snowcapped trees on the mountainside of $map:02000260$. Be sure to search the place thoroughly.
I knew I could count on you. The ice cave is hidden behind some snowcapped trees on the mountainside of $map:02000260$. Be sure to search the place thoroughly.
<font color="#909090">(There's a cold wind coming from behind the trees. This must be the place $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ spoke of.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s ice cave should be just beyond this tree.)</font>
(Enter the ice cave.)
So, what did you discover?
I had a run-in with the forces of darkness.
Then there's something here that has their interest. Did anything else happen?
I met your swordsman.
And yet you're uninjured. Even against you, I doubt he could have been defeated so easily...
He saved me from an ambush.
Then he is an enemy of the forces of darkness, after all. He must know something that we don't...
This swordsman could be a valuable ally. Unfortunately, he doesn't seem interested in accepting our help...
Not everyone is a team player.
Well, there's little to be done about that. More to the point, were you able to explore the deep end of the ice cavern? We couldn't get very far.
There's a narrow valley at the end, but the cold is too bitter to go further.
Hmm... They say the cold of this place is legendary. Now we know why. It's said that only the citizens of the snow kingdom could... That's it!
The cold seems to have slowed my wits! The snow kingdom vanished a while ago, but some of its citizens still belong to the empire. That includes $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ over there!
Isn't that the weapon merchant from $map:02000001$...?
Correct. He's come to help keep us supplied. But before he came to the capital, he lived in the snow kingdom that used to be here. There's a chance he know a way to get past the bitter cold.
It wouldn't hurt to ask.
I think that would be for the best. I'll leave this to you.
$npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ may be our only hope for continuing the investigation.
Hey! I remember you from $map:02000001$!
I was hoping you could help me with something...
You're mistaken. We've never met.
Don't play games with me. I've seen you wandering around $map:02000001$ before! I never forget a potential customer.
I was hoping you could help me with something...
...That passage leads to the $map:52000083$, and the cold that stopped you is the magic of $npc:11003069[gender:1]$...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003060[gender:0]$'s expression darkens.)</font>

I volunteered to help the captain for a reason. I wanted a chance to see my queen again. But that snowstorm... I'm not strong enough to get through it. Each snowflake felt like the tears of $npc:11003069[gender:1]$, grieving the loss of her kingdom and $npc:11003075[gender:0]$...
Must you really go in there? If $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ is using this kind of magic, then she wants to be alone.
All the more reason for me to go.
What do you mean?
The forces of darkness are here, too. Your queen is in danger.
Then... then there's no other option. Do you promise you'll save her?
I will, but first I need to get through the blizzard.
$npcName:11003063[gender:0]$... He can help.
Normally, you'd need enough magic power to match $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ if you wanted to get through the blizzard. Luckily for us, I know of a special potion that should do the trick.

Yetis aren't usually good with potions. Our sense of smell is too weak to find herbs, you see. But $npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ is special. He can find herbs with his skinny little fingers and use them to make all kinds of medicine.
Where is he?
$map:02000263$. He's a little guy. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.
$map:02000263$. He's a little guy. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.
Too cold to talk. Shoo.
I need $item:20000451$.
Wh-what? Who're you? What do you want? Do you even know what you're asking?
I need to get through $npc:11003069[gender:1]$'s blizzard and make sure she's okay.
$npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ sent you, didn't he? Always sniveling about queen this and royal duty that.
Is it wrong for him to be worried?
He's worrying over nothing! Stubborn oaf...

Sure, she was a fine queen, when times are good. But it all fell apart overnight! The kingdom vanished, and the king and queen with it. The cold wasn't the worst part... The worst part is how we all scattered.
So she wants to hole herself up and mope, when we're the ones who suffered because of her? Fine by me! I'll be happy if I never see her again!
I'm not asking you to see her. I just need your help.
Not interested! That potion is a pain in the tush to make. It's hard to get the ingredients.
The forces at work here are a threat to all of Maple World!
If they're such a big threat, why are they wasting their time in the remains of some has-been kingdom?
That's what I need to find out. Can you make the $item:20000451$?
Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. Grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.
Come back before I change my mind.
Prickly-cold $itemPlural:30000723$. Grow under the flowers in $map:02000263$. Sandpaper-rough $item:30000724$, freshly plucked at $map:02000264$. Get me those things and I'll make you the potion.
Another few minutes and I was going to wander off. Hand over the stuff.
(Give him the ingredients.)
Those'll do. Go stand over there. Need room to work.
The $item:20000451$ is complete. It will let you endure the blizzard. But remember, potions don't last forever. This one especially!
Drink it right before you enter $map:52000082$. If you use it too soon, it'll wear off and you'll wind up a popsicle.
What's the matter?
I lost the $item:20000451$...
How long does the potion last?
Good thing I made a big batch. Here's a refill. Remember, it won't last long, so hurry!
It's in your bag. I'm not a charity, you know! Only one potion at a time!
Your bag is crammed full of garbage. Make some room.
Not long. That's all I can say. If I were you, I'd drink it right before going into $map:52000082$.
You and that swordsman saved me. I'll never forget your kindness... But how did you make it through the blizzard?
I had help from some yetis.
The yetis look like big oafs, but they're actually very resourceful. $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ were fond of them. I was hoping to get help from one of them...
If he were here, $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ might have made a different choice. I tried sending for him, but I never got a response. $map:02000001$ must be terribly far away...
A yeti in $map:02000001$... Do you mean $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$?
Yes! He sells weapons there. Before the kingdom fell, he was the gatekeeper of $map:52000086$ for a very, very long time. I'm surprised you know him!
He's in $map:52000080$ at this very moment.
Then... he did come! We still have a chance to protect $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ from that specter. $npcName:11003060$ may be able to stop her from opening the $map:52000085$...!
I... sure. We could probably make that happen.
Thank heavens. No, thank you!
We need to get $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ and go to the $map:02000381$! But... I can hardly walk in this state...
Let me go in your place.
But... This is for $npc:11003069[gender:1]$... I can't ask an outsider...
I needed to go to $map:02000381$ with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ anyway.
But... What business could you have there...?
I need to investigate the specter for myself.
I understand. I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. It's the least I can do to thank you...
It's no problem. You should get some rest.
Thank you. Let me know when you're ready...
I'm ready.
Wait a minute.
O winds of the blizzard, open a path through the heavens...!
My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.
I'm ready.
I'll open a path to $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$. Let me know when you're ready.
I'm ready.
Wait a minute.
O winds of the blizzard, open a path through the heavens...!
My magic might make you a little dizzy. I wish I could go with you, but this spell can only move one person at a time... Let me know when you're ready.
I'm ready.
W-well? Is the queen all right?
I need you're help. We have to get to the $map:02000381$.
I-is that where the queen is? What is going on?
(Bring him up to date.)
Then we really do have to hurry. Something big is going on.

The $map:02000382$ is the only way to reach the $map:52000086$. The snow kingdom is lost, but its secret treasure is still there. Our wise ancestors locked it up so that its power couldn't be used against the world...
The Frozen Crystal... It's in a vault in the $map:02000383$, locked away by perfect yeti engineering. Only the queen can open up the path through the $map:02000382$ to get there.
The vault itself can only be opened by both the king and queen together. And they'd never do so willingly, since they know how dangerous the treasure is.
But now the kingdom is gone... and so is the king. And this specter promised the queen that he could somehow reunite her with $npc:11003075[gender:0]$...
If $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ is alive, then the vault can be opened?
Yes. That's why we have to stop $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ at the shrine. I don't think she'll like us thwarting her plan to meet $npc:11003075[gender:0]$ again...
That seems pretty selfish of her.

For as long as our kingdom was around, every queen had her king, and every king was made for his queen. They are two halves to the whole. To be separated from each other is unbearable... I'm sure $npc:11003075[gender:0]$ would do the same thing in her shoes.
That's why I have to protect her! She already lost too much. Even if it's her fault that we have no kingdom or king, she's suffered enough...
There's a path on the slope over $map:02000260$ that leads to the $map:02000381$. The $map:02000382$ is there... somewhere. I'll meet you in the mountains.
I'm not sure how to get there...
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
Are you lost?
How do I get there again?
Can't you just take me there?

There's a path on the slope over $map:02000260$ that leads to the $map:02000381$. Halfway up, you'll see a bunch of trees near the stairs. Search the snow wall and you'll see a small cave that shines with blue light. Go in there.
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
I can't say I wasn't expecting this... but I can't just give up.
We have no idea how much danger the Frozen Crystal is in or what dangers $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ will meet at the $map:02000383$.
$MyPCName$... I appreciate everything you've done for me... But are you sure you've got time to fix the problems of a kingdom that already fell?
I'm pretty sure the forces of darkness are here, so this is my business, too.
Then... will you go to the $map:02000383$ with me? I need to keep looking for $npc:11003069[gender:1]$.
Yes. We'll do this together.
Thank you. Let me know when you're ready to leave.
Let me know when you're ready to leave.
The $map:52000086$... It's hidden by a veil of frost beyond $map:02000263$. But the door should appear to us, now that $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ opened the way.
Give me a moment. I'll find the door...
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ is chanting to himself.)</font>
(Wait a little bit.)
Found it. At the top of $map:02000263$. The door to the $map:52000086$ is there.
I'm not sure how to get there...
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
Are you lost?
How do I get there again?
Can't you just take me there?
Find the tallest, steepest part of $map:02000263$. The door to the $map:52000086$ is there.
All right... Close your eyes for a minute. The winds of the tundra will guide you there.
It seems you've been busy. Good to have you back.
I've been buried in mission briefings and paperwork this entire time. I wish I could have been out there in the field, with you...
(Fill him in on everything that happened.)
I never thought I'd hear the names $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ again. Everyone thought they vanished along with their kingdom.
I suspect this specter is allied with the forces of darkness. There's a plot brewing. And how does the $npcName:11003062[gender:0]$ fit into all of this...?
I have no idea what became of him.
He's certainly a match for either of us in a fight. It seems you're especially worried about him...
<font color="#909090">(He knew something about the specter...)</font>

Anyway, all sorts of powerful beings are coming out from the woodwork. It's as if the enemy is moving their pieces into position. Meanwhile, we don't even know what game we're supposed to be playing...
Ah, one last thing. We've been recalled to $map:02000001$. My troops and I will be departing soon.
Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.
I've been buried in mission briefings and paperwork this entire time. I wish I could have been out there in the field, with you...
(Fill him in on everything that happened.)
I never thought I'd hear the names $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ again. Everyone thought they vanished along with their kingdom.
I suspect this specter is allied with the forces of darkness. There's a plot brewing. And how does the $npcName:11003062[gender:0]$ fit into all of this...?
I have no idea what became of him.
He's certainly a match for either of us in a fight. It seems you're especially worried about him...
<font color="#909090">(Something about his swordsmanship... It was somehow familiar...)</font>
All sorts of powerful beings are coming out from the woodwork. It's as if the enemy is moving their pieces into position. Meanwhile, we don't even know what game we're supposed to be playing...
Ah, one last thing. We've been recalled to $map:02000001$. My troops and I will be departing soon.
Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.
Why don't you speak with $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ before we go? I think he has something to tell you.
$MyPCName$!
How are you holding up?
I'm fine now. $npc:11003069[gender:1]$ took care of me.
The queen was real quiet for a while. When she finally spoke up, she thanked me for all the help. She's grateful to you, too. Honestly, I was dumbstruck at being thanked by the queen herself!
I don't know what happened to the king. I don't even know if that guy was really $npc:11003075[gender:0]$... I can't imagine how the queen feels about this. It's enough to break a yeti's heart.
You should be proud. You did good work.
Thanks... But I couldn't've done it without you. I'll be doing my best to cheer my queen up from now on.
$npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11003066[gender:1]$ will want to help.
You're right! I don't got to do this alone. There's no point feeling bad about the kingdom we lost. Now we got to appreciate those of us who stuck around.
I'm rooting for you.
And I'm rooting for you, too! Don't be a stranger. Come visit me at my stall in $map:02000001$ sometime, okay?
You're going back to $map:02000001$ after all this?
Hey, a yeti's got to make a living! And adventurers like you count on me for my fine craftsmanship. I'll be able to find plenty of time to visit here.
<font color="#909090">(You should return to $map:02000001$ and check in with the empress.)</font>
Well, I'd better get my stuff together. See you back in $map:02000001$!
Well, I'd better get my stuff together. See you back in $map:02000001$!
$npc:11000076[gender:0]$ tells me that your performance on this latest mission has been exemplary.
(Give a brief report.)
We may not have learned more about $npc:11001851[gender:1]$, but I'd call this mission a success. The forces of darkness are expanding their operations all over Maple World.
$npc:11003075[gender:0]$ was once a benevolent king. To hear what's become of him, I can't help but think that the forces of darkness were behind the collapse of his kingdom.
We need to keep our ears to the ground. If any new disasters crop up, I'll let you know as well.
I will remember the service you've rendered. Thank you, $MyPCName$.
$map:02000076$ needs our help.
Not so fast, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$'s knights are already... indisposed, and your guards are needed to protect $map:02000001$.
$map:02000076$'s militia is strong. They wouldn't ask for our help if the situation wasn't dire, minister. We can't turn our backs on them!
Let us say we do send our forces to help $map:02000076$. Would that not make $map:02000001$ a tempting target? Would you leave the empress exposed to these fiends?
(There has to be a way to help...!)
You're right, minister. Still, we must do something. What if we sent a small, elite team to aid $map:02000076$ while the bulk of our forces stayed here?
Absolutely not. The last thing we need is you taking your best men and gallavanting off into the woods. Your place is here, by Her Imperial Majesty's side!
<font color="#909090">(Court politics! This isn't what you signed up for. It's time to take matters into your own hands. Speak with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Court politics! This isn't what you signed up for. It's time to take matters into your own hands. Speak with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$.)</font>
Hmm... Both the minister and the captain bring up good points.
I will go to $map:02000076$ myself.
Alone? That sounds dangerous.
$npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ wants to send an elite team. Let me be that team.
If it were anyone else, I'd call it bravado. But you... You just might be up to the task.
$MyPCName$, we are in your debt. Go now to $map:02000076$ and do what you can to help those people.
The scout's portal is still open. Are you ready to go?
I'm ready now.
Portals give me motion sickness.
Tell $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ that we will send reinforcements as soon as we have the soldiers to spare. Good luck.
I'm sure you'll be fine. Imperial portals are famous for being a smooth ride. No portal sickness or your next teleportation is free!
I was jok—Ah, never mind. I'm ready.
Tell $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ that we will send reinforcements as soon as we have the soldiers to spare. Good luck.
I haven't seen a fight like that in a long time. You have our thanks.
I believe $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ would like to speak with you.
I was concerned when you were the only reinforcements we received from $map:02000001$, but it seems the empress knows what she's doing. We're lucky to have you.
It's too early for us to let our guard down, though. We need to be ready for another attack, and we have to make sure we have enough food and supplies.
I'm sure $map:02000001$ will send supplies.
Probably. In the meantime, I'm going to survey the town. See where we were hit hardest.
Thorough as always, Captain. I leave this in your hands.
The militia will take things from here. $npc:11000001[gender:0]$, you need to get some rest.
The militia will take things from here. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$, you need to get some rest.
$MyPCName$, if you wouldn't mind, I have a request for you.
This is something of a personal request. I would like you to bring back a certain young man...
And who might that be?
His name is $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$, and he's... my son. He was hurt in the fighting, so he should still be at $map:02000027$.
He may not be eager to see me. I was... hard on him earlier.
And why's that?

He spotted the enemy while patrolling $map:02000054$, but he decided to try fighting them himself rather than coming back and reporting their position. Maybe I was being unreasonable, but we can't allow such sloppiness in the militia!
It's because of his actions that many of our friends were hurt. He was too busy chasing glory to bother doing the right thing. Still, I wonder if I wasn't too harsh...
All I want is a nice, quiet conversation with my boy. Will you bring $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ to me?
All I want is a nice, quiet conversation with my boy. Will you bring $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ to me? He should be in $map:02000027$.
Welcome to my hospital.
You don't look like you're here as a patient. So, what can I do for you?
I'm looking for someone in particular.
As you can see, the hospital is empty today. Pretty amazing, considering that we were just under attack. It's all thanks to my patented first aid kits, you know.
Has $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ been in at all?
I haven't seen that troublemaker all day, and thank goodness for that. I'm always patching up some scrape or bruise on that scamp.
Do you know where I might find $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$?
$npcName:11000961[gender:1]$ is his friend, though I can't say I understand why. She should be on patrol near the hills.
I'll check with $npcName:11000961[gender:1]$, then.
While you're at it, would you mind delivering some first aid supplies? The militia could probably use it after that last scrape-up. It's inside the cabinet just over there.
