A decade ago I would have given those whippersnappers a run for their money. But now I am an old lady and it takes me a day just to cross my front yard.
I will retrieve your ladle, fair snail.
Then follow the water down to the pond. Search in the grass near the stream. That is where they usually drop it.
I know it is a very very far way away. But surely you can go faster than that.
You have already found it. Thank you so very much.
You helped me in my time of greatest need. The least I can do is to hear you out.
(Give her the short version of the story.)
One greedy fool can ruin things for everyone at times like this. I feel sorry that you have been through so much trouble. I will help but you must follow my instructions to a tee.
To a tee! Got it!
Go to the $map:02000180$ and defeat $npc:22000007$. Once you have done that he should drop his $item:30000186$. With that in hand you will be able to read the Dimensional Dictionary.
That sounds awfully simple...

The Dimension Dictionary will only reveal its secrets to one with the power and inclination to defeat the darkness. It does not concern itself with fancy rituals or inane subtlety. In other words it is too good for that greedy librarian.
Return to $npc:11000282[gender:0]$ when you have the $item:30000186$. Most importantly, you must make sure that you are the one to first open the book. Good luck.
Return to $npc:11000282[gender:0]$ when you have the $item:30000186$. Most importantly, you must make sure that you are the one to first open the book. Good luck.
Either you've succeeded and I finally get to read the book, or you've failed and I get to gloat. Either way, I win.
We have business in the $map:02000219$.
That pompous slug agreed to help you? I can't believe it...
So, how is it done? How can we finally read that accursed book?
I can show you. In the $map:02000219$.
How untrusting you are. Do you really think I wouldn't honor my end of the bargain, after all we've been through?
Yes. Yes, absolutely. That is exactly what I think.
Fine, fine! Let us go to the $map:02000219$. Then you will see that I am a piece of my word.
Fine, fine! Let us go to the $map:02000219$. Then you will see that I am a piece of my word.
Are you certain the enchantment has been removed? The pages are still blank. Is this some sort of trick?
(That's odd. You definitely see writing in the book...)
Wait... This can't be... <font color="#909090">($npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ snatches up the book and examines it frantically)</font>
The enchantment... It only lets one person read it! Did you know this would happen? Is this why you were so insistent on opening the book yourself?
Maaaaybe.
That shriveled old snail...! $MyPCName$, what's written inside? Tell me every word!
This isn't exactly light reading material!
If I ever get my hands on that snail...!
Does this mean that there's no way to read this book... ever...?
I could take it with me to $map:02000023$ and work on it there...
This was your plan from the start! I knew it. I can always tell a thief when I see one...
Do you have any better ideas?
Fine! I shall let you abscond to $map:02000023$ with my precious book!
You are too kind.
But when you're done with it, you must return it in pristine condition! And with a transcribed copy! You have no idea how much I paid to add it to my collection...
When you're done with it, you must return it in pristine condition! And with a transcribed copy! You have no idea how much I paid to add it to my collection...
How did your meeting with $npcName:11000282[gender:0]$ go?
He gave me the book. No big deal.
My faith in you was well placed. Thank you!
But why are the pages blank? Oh! It's enchanted...
(Explain everything.)
If that's true, then I will need you to read the book aloud to me while I interpret its meaning... Impossible! This is a reference book, not an adventure novel. What are we going to do?
Maybe $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ can read it.
That's a good point. For all we know, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ could be immune to this sort of magic. Could you go to the $map:02000179$ and see if he has better luck?
Will do.
Very well. I leave this in your capable hands.
$MyPCName$, could you go to the $map:02000179$ and see if $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has better luck with the Dimensional Dictionary?
Will do.
Very well. I leave this in your capable hands.
So, what brings you to my remote abode?
(Hand him the Dimensional Dictionary.)
Interesting. I don't sense any sort of enchantment on this book at all. It should be simple enough for me to read and interpret.
Leave this with me. I'll have a transcription for you soon.
Even here, I've been keeping a close watch on the shadows that threaten Maple World. I understand that you've read my notes on the spreading darkness.

It all began with the $itemPlural:20000045$. That led me to research the shadow seeds. And then I received a report that dark magic has been found on the divine creatures that call this world their home.
I need to know how far the darkness has spread, and you're the only person I trust to find out for me.
I'll do whatever I can.
I had a feeling you'd say that. Please deliver this letter to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ in $map:02000023$. He'll help you come up with a plan of action.
I'll teleport you to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$.
Shall I send you to $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ now?
Please do.
I'd rather go on foot.
Very well.
All right. Until next time.
How is $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$?
(Give him $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s letter.)
Hmm... Nothing is ever simple, is it?

While there are many divine beasts who have walked Maple World since ancient times, there are two in particular about whom I've received troubling reports. Let's start by looking into $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$, guardian of the lava fields.
It's believed that he's somehow related to $npcName:23100039[gender:0]$ of $map:02000312$... though I'll admit that it's mere speculation based on their similar names.
For now, go to $map:02000079$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$'s condition. I can only hope that he is not corrupted...
Go to $map:02000079$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100041[gender:0]$'s condition. I can only hope that he is not corrupted...
How did the investigation go?
(Report what you saw in $map:02000079$.)
It's as I feared. Thank you for your trouble...
The next beast to check on is $npcName:23100021$, the great griffin of the $map:02000009$. It's recently started attacking anyone who goes near its domain.
Travel to $map:02000316$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100021$'s recent behavior. I look forward to your report.
Travel to $map:02000316$ and see what you can learn of $npcName:23100021$'s recent behavior. I look forward to your report.
What did you learn?
(Tell him about $npcName:23100021$.)
That... isn't quite what I expected to hear. Thank you for the information.
While you were away, I received a message from $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$. It seems he needs to see you in the $map:02000179$.
I can send you there now, if you'd like.
Yes, please.
I need to make myself presentable first.
Very good. Off you go!
Is that so? Well, tell me when you're ready...
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ wishes to see you in the $map:02000179$. It sounded urgent.
Yes, please.
I need to make myself presentable first.
Very good. Off you go!
Is that so? Well, tell me when you're ready...
The Dimensional Dictionary has taught me so much! I thought it would be useful as a mere reference, but there is so much information in here. Things that even I did not know...

I've learned that when an Innocent chooses his path, the other half of his power doesn't simply become dormant. It becomes its own being. $npc:11003441[gender:0]$, then, is the version of myself that I did not choose.
Furthermore, it's possible to change an Innocent's path. I thought that my decision had been final, but in a short time I've learned that I can be split in two... and be replaced by my darker self.
It's all a bit grim for my taste. Luckily, I've also got something interesting to tell you.

Among the many fascinating sections of the Dictionary is an appendix of magical minerals and how they interact with each other. With a little bit of experimentation, I've created a rather interesting object.
Interesting in a good way, I hope.

According to the known rules of magic, long-range scrying requires a specific target or location. But with some black onyx and a dose of emutal powder, I've managed to create a device that can show you a... hint, let's say. A clue to whatever mystery it is that you're pondering!
There's one mystery in particular that I'd like to use it to solve, but I need your help.
And what's this mystery?
I want to learn who is behind the darkness spreading from the $map:02000146$. The mastermind who has attacked our cities. I'm convinced that these events are all linked.
You have stood against our shadowy enemy every step of the way. If you touch the crystal, I believe that it will point us in the right direction.
You have stood against our shadowy enemy every step of the way. If you touch the crystal, I believe that it will point us in the right direction.
It's $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$... And he's looking for someone. Someone named $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. But how is $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ connected to all this?
That's what we need to find out. He's our best chance at tracking down the source of this evil.
$MyPCName$, you've worked with Dark Wind recently. Do you have any ideas about this?
That name, $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. I'm sure I've heard it somewhere...
$npcName:11000492[gender:0]$... The $npcName:11003167[gender:0]$... The Barrota Trading Company!
Yes, that's right! $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ is the head of the Barrota Trading Company. But I heard that he'd gone missing...
His name came up when I was investigating $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$'s death. But it was $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ who got me to focus on hunting down $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$, instead.
Some of the things I heard and saw didn't quite add up. $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is the leader of Dark Wind... But can we trust him? I'm not convinced.
Maybe it's not just $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ alone, but Dark Wind as a whole that's hiding something. Their old captain, $npc:11001816[gender:0]$, was one of the Seven Heroes.

Is there anyone who knows $map:02000100$ and Dark Wind well enough to give us an objective opinion? Someone who isn't part of the organization, but in a good position to observe their comings and goings.
I can try $npc:11000065[gender:0]$.
That's a good idea. The mayor will certainly know more than we do. Please go to $map:02000157$ and see what you can find out.
That's a good idea. The mayor will certainly know more than we do. Please go to $map:02000157$ and see what you can find out.
Excuse me! May I help you?
I'm here to see the mayor.
I'm so sorry, but I don't seem to see your name on the schedule. Did you make an appointment?
I do so wish I could help you, but the mayor isn't seeing anyone without an appointment. You really should have made one.
When's his next opening?
I can pencil you in for... How does the week after next work for you?
In the meantime, I'd be happy to take a message for you.
I don't have time to wait two weeks!

Oh, I'm so so sorry, but the mayor is very strict about his schedule. I'd have to beg him heart and soul to get him to see you without an appointment. And, no offense, but why should I go through all that trouble for you?
What if I told you it's really, really important?
If it's so important, then maybe you should do me a favor. I'm really worried about my little sister. If you help me out, I could try to convince the mayor to see you.
Sure.
Wonderful! $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ got a new job a few weeks ago, and nobody's heard from her since. My parents are worried sick. Mind giving her a visit at the $map:02000008$?
Wonderful! $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ got a new job a few weeks ago, and nobody's heard from her since. My parents are worried sick. Mind giving her a visit at the $map:02000008$?
This isn't the life I dreamed of. Not at all...
Ahem! Are you $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?
Uh, yeah? And who are you?
I can't believe my sister sent you to spy on me! That dweeb.
I thought I'd get to wear a prettier uniform than my sister and work in a nice cushy lab, but look at me. They're making me do fieldwork. And there are so many monsters!
I'm good at theoretical models and crunching numbers, but I'm not cut out for fighting! And now my boss expects me to gather samples myself. I'm doomed...
Hold on. You look pretty strong. Can you help me? Defeat the monsters around here and get some $itemPlural:30000872$. The sooner I have those, the sooner I can finish my report and head home!
Hold on. You look pretty strong. Can you help me? Defeat the monsters around here and get some $itemPlural:30000872$. The sooner I have those, the sooner I can finish my report and head home!
That was quick. Thanks so much!
Perfect! Give me a minute, and I'll write up my report.
Take your time.
Take my time? I'm already done! Mind taking this to my boss?
You want me to do it?
His name is $npcName:11000869[gender:0]$ and he's looking into something at $map:02000142$. They say he's hard to impress, but he'll have to be amazed if you tell him how great I am.
By the way, would you please tell him how great I am? If he keeps treating me like the most junior member of the team, I'll never get back to the safety of the lab!
Sure.
You're an angel! Thank you. Remember, you're looking for $npcName:11000869[gender:0]$ in $map:02000142$!
What's wrong?
I lost the $item:30000873$...
Why do you want to work in the lab?
Please take this more seriously! Anyway, I made a copy, so here. Don't drop it this time!
Um, I'm pretty sure it's in your bag. You're an odd one, you know that?
If I give it to you now, you'll just drop it again. Make some room in your bag please.
Isn't it obvious? All this sun exposure is terrible for my skin!
Huh? You aren't one of my people...
(Hand over the report.) From $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$.
Ah, yes, the new hire. They really are helpless in their first few years...

Many researchers think fieldwork is a waste of time—especially the young ones. I could send $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$ back to the lab, but then she'd miss this opportunity to see this abnormal temporal phenomenon in person!
Have you ever heard of a temporal stop? Most laypersons think such things are science fiction, but it's happening right here. The closer you are to the clock tower, the slower time moves.
We arrived here three days ago, but I suspect that much more time has passed in the outside world.
$npcName:11000868[gender:1]$'s sister told me she'd been gone for weeks!
Whatever is causing this anomaly must be in the tower. We occasionally hear explosions from within, too. I sent some researchers to look into it, but none of them returned.
But is this temporal stop dangerous?
If the temporal stop spreads, then it would wreak havoc on the whole world. But how can I do anything with a handful of scientists?
I can look into it.

Truly? What a courageous young $male:man,female:woman$ you are! Please go inside the $map:02000357$ and discover the source of this phenomenon. As much as I'd love to study it, I fear you will have to destroy it... for the good of the whole world.
Please go inside the $map:02000357$ and discover the source of this phenomenon. As much as I'd love to study it, I fear you will have to destroy it... for the good of the whole world.
Please tell me you took exhaustive notes!
(Tell him about $npcName:23000077$ and $npcName:22400062$.)
Ah-ha! I suspected such a being might exist in there.
I'll have to run a full analysis on the area! ...is what I would say if I could afford the equipment. Which is sadly a pipe dream on our current budget.
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ pledged his support for this project when he was running for reelection, but we haven't seen a single meso since. He won't return my calls, he won't accept my appointments...
You know his secretary is $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$'s sister, right?
Really? That unhelpful young lady is related to our $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?
Well, my work here is done. I need to head back.
When you get there, tell $npc:11000361[gender:1]$ about how much her sister is suffering thanks to our budget problem. She may be our best hope at getting the mayor back on our side.
When you get to $map:02000157$, tell $npc:11000361[gender:1]$ about how much her sister is suffering thanks to our budget problem. She may be our best hope at getting the mayor back on our side.
I honestly didn't think you were coming back. Did you see $npcName:11000868[gender:1]$?
Yes. Her research is... something else.
I'm sure it is. I just hope she learns from all this.
Anyway, you owe me a favor.
Do I?
I want to see $npc:11000065[gender:0]$.
Of course. You do have an appointment, after all. It's been two weeks since you were last here...
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is in the $map:02000154$. Please use the door to my right.
He is a very busy man, so don't waste his time. And do avoid asking any uncomfortable questions.
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is in the $map:02000154$. Please use the door on this side. He is a very busy man, so don't waste his time. And do avoid asking any uncomfortable questions.
Please, make yourself comfortable. How can I help you today?
I had some questions about Dark Wind.
You've worked with them in the past. Why don't you go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person?
I'd like an outsider's perspective.
I want to hear about it from a great man like you.
I... see. I'll answer what I can. What's your question?
What do you know about $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s death?
You're laying it on a little thick there. I don't have a lot of time to waste, so cut to the chase.
What do you know about $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$'s death?
Who put you up to this?
I don't know what you're trying to dig up, but I have nothing to tell you about Dark Wind. Even if I did, $map:02000100$ can't take any action against them.
My hands are full trying to deal with constant threats of riot—stirred up by $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ and his foul group, according to reports. Dark Wind is vital to keeping them at bay.
But perhaps I should tell you one thing. Something for you to keep in mind. Not everything about a hero is great, and not everyone under a leader believes in the same values.
I'll... keep that in mind?
It's a shame that I couldn't be more help. If you want to know more about Dark Wind, go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person. That's all I have to say.
Thanks for your time, I guess.
Looks like I'm talking to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, after all.
It's a shame that I couldn't be more help. If you want to know more about Dark Wind, go to $map:02000153$ and ask $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ in person. That's all I have to say.
It's been too long, friend. I hope you've been well.
We've been busy restoring $map:02000100$, but it's time we got back to the hunt for $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. Interested?
Actually, I wanted to ask about $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.
$npcName:11000526[gender:0]$... $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$... The old Barrota boss? He's on the run for insider trading and embezzling. I'm not interested in going after small fry like him.
(That's not what $npcName:11003445$'s crystal said...)
No, we need to track down $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and make him pay for what he did to $npcName:11001816[gender:0]$. That's our only priority right now.
(He keeps going back to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.)
<font color="#909090">(If $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ really is hiding something, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ might know what it is. You should try to get to him before Dark Wind does.)</font>
You're right. Let's get $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
I knew you'd come around. Thanks.
Oh, man... He's gonna lose it again...
The boss is usually calm, but when he loses his cool, man... I'm afraid to even go near him.
Any mention of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ just sets him off. He doesn't get mad about other things...

All the other agents are out looking for $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ 'cause they don't want to get yelled at. Of course we're all worried for her safety, but we're more worried about what he'll do if we don't find her...
Hey! Report! If anything happens to $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, I'm taking it out of your hide!
I-I don't really know the details. $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$ might have seen something. H-he was standing guard at $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$.
$MyPCName$, let's talk.
D-don't let me keep you!
D-don't let me keep you!
I apologize for losing my cool.
All of my resources are tied up in the search for $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, but it's not enough. Her life may be in danger. Can I count on your support?
Sure.
Go to $map:02000147$ and meet with $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$. As the guard posted in front of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house, he may have seen something.
Go to $map:02000147$ and meet with $npcName:11000258[gender:0]$. As the guard posted in front of $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s house, he may have seen something.
Hey, I know you. What brings you here?
Tell me about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s disappearance.
Look, it's like I told the others: I don't understand what happened. It was a day like any other. She went to $map:02000221$ to return some books she'd borrowed, and she never came out.
I got a bad feeling about the situation and ran inside, but $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ was already gone.
Was anyone else there?
$npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ was behind the counter... dozing off. He didn't see a thing. Funny coincidence, right?
I mean... We need some kind of lead to track $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ down. If we don't, it'll be us agents who suffer.

Every one of us is in the field, and we've found nothing. $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ doesn't know you. He won't give me the time of day, but there's a chance he'll open up if you're the one asking the questions.

Every one of us in the field, and we've found nothing. $MyPCName$, $npcName:11000531[gender:0]$ doesn't know you. He won't give me the time of day, but there's a chance he'll open up if you're the one asking the questions.
Any particular book you're after? I'm sure I've got something to tickle your fancy.
I want to know about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$'s disappearance.

Sure, sure. I've got time to answer the same questions a million times. Not as if I have a shop to run... Anyway, like I told the others, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ traded in her old books and picked out a new one.
It was just like any other day. She went to look for her book behind that shelf over there. I dozed off while she made her pick, and when I awoke, she was gone.
That's all I know. Good heavens, I'm sick and tired of telling this story.
I've said all I've got to say. If you aren't here for books, please leave.
Did anyone else come here the day $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ disappeared?

Not anyone who matters! The only other customer I had all day was $npcName:11000532[gender:0]$, son of the family that runs the bed-and-breakfast on $map:02000111$. But he was gone long before $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ came in.
Do you know what books $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ came for?
Let's see... $item:39000012$ and $item:39000013$, if I recall correctly. Why do you care?
Where can I find those books?
Check the shelves in back, over by the owl clock. If you ask me, you're just wasting your time...
Check the shelves in back, over by the owl clock. If you ask me, you're just wasting your time...
Welcome, welcome! Here to rent a room?
(Show him the books.)
Uh...? These are the books I borrowed from $map:02000221$... Why did you bring them back here?
Do you know a woman named $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$?
I—uh... I'm not sure...?
You both checked out the exact same books.
Uh, l-look, I don't know what this is all about. The money was good, and all I had to do was borrow and return the books. I didn't even read them...
Wh-why are you snooping around about this? Did I do something illegal? Is this some kinda spy thing?
$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is missing.
And what do those books have to do with... Wait, I remember! There was also the thing with the bag.
The thing with what bag?
As part of the job, I also had to leave a bag under the table at $map:02000221$. It was locked, so I don't have a clue what was in it. I guess it was gone by the time you got there...
Who hired you?
Uh, the thing is... I never actually met them. They gave me instructions through notes, with the books and money left in a box hidden by the street leading from $map:02000039$ to the $map:02000045$.
I always figured it was some nut living in the $map:02000045$, but... Honestly, I was just in it for a little extra spending cash. That's all I know.
I always figured it was some nut living in the $map:02000045$, but... Honestly, I was just in it for a little extra spending cash. That's all I know.
Can I help you with something?
Have you seen anyone come through here with books?
Nope, can't say I have. And nothing gets past here without my noticing.
(Describe $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ for him.)
Now, why would a delicate lady like that come to a place like this? Never seen her around here. Unless she's coming through in the dead of night...
(Explain everything.)
I reckon you're up to some important work, then. I haven't seen anyone like you described, but there's one place where they might slip by unnoticed...
A little ways from here you'll see the moving bridge—some of our finest work, if I do say so myself. We haven't gotten to the ravine the bridge crosses, though.
If someone was itching to hide, the ravine would be the place to go. Why not look there?
If you're so sure that someone's been skulking about, why not look in the ravine under the bridge?
<font color="#909090">(This mud wall looks man-made. There's something written under the muck...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You wipe away the mud and read the letters.)</font>
$map:02000051$ ——— valley ——— Yamarcha ——— w —— fin———
<font color="#909090">(It seems like a record of $map:02000051$.)</font>
$map:02000051$ ——— valley ——— Yamarcha ——— w —— fin———
<font color="#909090">(It seems like a record related to $map:02000051$. Go to $map:02000031$ and seek out $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$'s advice.)</font>
So, what brings you to me today?
Have you ever heard the name "Yamarcha?"
Yamarcha... That's an ancient $map:02000051$ tribe.
The Yamarcha were said to have sold their souls to the darkness. They gained great power, but they lost their free will in the bargain. Why do you ask?
(Tell her about the words on the wall.)
That is intriguing... Valley... Yamarcha...
I need to think about this for a moment. In the meantime, why don't you look around and fetch any books on $map:02000051$ that you find?
I need to think about this for a moment. In the meantime, why don't you look around and fetch any books on $map:02000051$ that you find?
Well, I'm not sure how your search went, but I think I know what place the writing referred to.
It's the site of the War of the Wolves. I'm sure of it. You'll find the $map:02000229$ there.

The wolves of Vayar Mountain protect whoever worships their pack's god. The Yamarcha found their guardians in the red wolves. When they went mad with dark power and attacked $map:02000051$, the Murpagoth and their white wolves fought back.

Even after the Yamarcha fell, the War of the Wolves raged on. They're still fighting at $map:02000170$ to this day. Based on my research, I believe that the king of the red wolves, $npcName:21900090$, is trapped by dark magic in the $map:02000229$.

But why would $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ be interested in this place? To tell you the truth, I was going to search for the $map:02000229$ myself before all this terrible business with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$.
Why's that?
The temple was built by the Yamarcha for their dark rituals. Even though they are no longer in this world, their power still remains within the temple.
I don't know what $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is after, but if you're going after them, this is our chance to right some wrongs. I'd like you to take this $item:30000076$ with you.
What is it?
This is the key that can free a soul from unholy chains. Since you're going into the temple anyway, please rescue $npcName:21900090$ from the darkness that keeps him trapped.
Why do I have to do that?

There are others who have sought the resting place of the Yamarcha, and they have all met terrible fates at the claws of $npcName:21900090$, who is a puppet for the darkness in his current state. We can't let anyone else fall to him.
I believe that $npcName:21900090$ doesn't want to hurt anyone. If we can release his soul, then no more blood needs to be shed.
The entrance to the $map:02000229$ should be at $map:02000170$. Good luck on your search. I hope you put the $item:30000076$ to good use...
Back already?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000076$.
I forgot what I'm supposed to do.
Really? All right. Well, here's a replacement...
I'm sure I saw you put it in your bag. Could you look again?
Um... Your bag looks terribly heavy. Maybe you should empty it out first.
Inside the $map:02000229$, burn away the undead body of $npcName:21900090$ with the $item:30000076$, then release his soul from its torment.
<font color="#909090">(In the light of the ember, you notice something behind the altar that wasn't visible before.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A bag has been left on the floor behind the altar. Did $npcName:11000522[gender:0]$ leave this behind? Look inside.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($item:39000034$ is inside. There's a map with a location marked inside...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It's near the $map:02000133$. You should continue your search there.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The $map:02000133$ is marked in $item:39000034$. Continue your search there.)</font>
And you must be $MyPCName$. You just missed $npc:11000064[gender:0]$.
How do you know me?
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ warned me you might come here.
But how did he know?
Humblis has kept a close eye on Dark Wind in recent days. In the process, our agents have had a few run-ins with you.
I'm pretty sure I never met your agents.
If you knew they were our agents, they wouldn't be doing their job. But we've been keeping tabs on your activities... including your recent meeting with $npc:11000065[gender:0]$.
After that, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ said you'd probably turn up on our doorstep sooner or later.
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ has been in contact with $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ this entire time. He finally convinced her to meet with us in person. They were supposed to meet here, but...

$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ was gone by the time we got here. It looked like there had been a struggle. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ chased after her himself, leaving me to take care of things here...
Where did he go?
He didn't exactly say. The attacker dropped something, but he was tight-lipped about what it was.
What did you guys find?
I didn't get a good look, but it looked like some sort of green jewel. It had a crest on it.
A crest, you say?
<font color="#909090">(Such an item had to belong to a noble family. $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ must have recognized the crest...)</font>
Did $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ say anything before he left?
He wanted me to give this letter to $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$. Beyond that... nothing.
I can deliver the letter if you want.
Sure. I think it's time the others met you for real. $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ should be at the $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$.
How may I help you?
I, uhh... misplaced $item:30000340$.
Where is $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$, again?
A letter from the boss can't just be replaced! Anyway, here's your replacement.
You sure it isn't still in your bag?
You need to clear up some inventory space first.
$npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ should be at the $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$.
Welcome to our humble abode, $MyPCName$.
(Give him $item:30000340$.)

<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ takes the letter and quickly reads it.)</font> He went into the Land of Darkness to retrieve $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. The fool... He'll help nobody by rushing off to his death.
Did he say where in the Land of Darkness he was headed?
Katramus... the Cruel Tower. It isn't a place anyone can hope to survive if they don't have a plan going in.
He's already gone, so there's no time left to plan. I wonder how the kidnapper knew where $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would be?
Do you know who it is?
Come now. You've proven helpful so far, but I can't trust you with that information yet. Even if you doubt $npc:11000044[gender:0]$'s intentions, that doesn't mean we're allies.
Speaking of which... Shouldn't you be reporting to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ right about now?
Why do you ask?
I want you to think about what you're going to tell him. It's clear that you're suspicious of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but we have no idea what he thinks of you.
Personally... I'd keep your distance from him if I were you. At least until you've had a chance to talk to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$.
So, what will you do? Do you want to help $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
Yep!
Nope!
Then meet me in Katramus. The entrance is in a place called $map:03000057$ in the Land of Darkness.
Then I have nothing else to say.
Where have you been? Did you find $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$?
(Tell him about $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, but leave $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ out of it.)
(Tell him everything.)
What have you been doing, then! $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$... Where are you...?
<font size='20'>I sense a trap closing around me... and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is the bait.</font>
<font size='20'>But no matter the risk, I can't allow $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to meet...</font>
<font size='20'>I have no choice. I need to ask for help from... him.</font>
$npcName:11000069[gender:1]$, kidnapped... How do you know all this?
I have my sources.
And those sources are?
I can't tell you.
You disappoint me. How am I supposed to trust in your report if you can't give me evidence?
If she really is in the Land of Darkness... Then it's a trap, and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is the bait.
We can't allow $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to meet... That is, we can't let him hurt her.
Will I have to ask for help from... him...?
So, $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is still alive! $MyPCName$, you've done well in telling me all this. I'll take it from here.
If she really is in the Land of Darkness... Then it's a trap, and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ is the bait.
We can't allow $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to meet... That is, we can't let him hurt her.
Will I have to ask for help from... him...?
I need to take care of some things here. In the meantime, I want you to hit the streets and see what else you can find.
<font color="#909090">(His eyes are darting across the room. He's usually more calm and collected than this...)</font>
Bring back any intel you find. Anything that can lead us to $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$. Got it?
(Nod.)
<font color="#909090">(Just as $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ said, it's hard to tell what he thinks of you. For now, it's best not to provoke him.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You need more information on Katramus. Return to the $map:02000031$ to talk to $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You need more information on Katramus. Return to the $map:02000031$ to talk to $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$.)</font>
How did it go?
(Tell her everything that's happened.)
Hmm... Something strikes a chord...
First, there's something I'd like to show you. $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ sent a letter. I put it right... Oh, dear.
Where did I put it? I was sure I had it just here. How strange!
I'll help you find it.
Yes, good idea. Could you search that pile of books over there?
I set it aside specifically so I wouldn't lose it. How maddening!
That's the letter. Thank you. The funny thing is, the paper is blank when I look at it. I suspect that the ink has been enchanted so that only you can read it.

$MyPCName$—I hope this letter finds you well. I've spent my days in study, punctuated only by the occasional attack on my sanctuary. The more time I spend here, the more I feel my memories begin to return.

I remember who brought me back to Ellinel. A woman in a red cape. She is a commander in the forces of darkness, and the mistress of the Cruel Tower in the Land of Darkness, where innocents of Maple World are stolen and forced into slavery...
I hate to jump to conclusions, but that description makes me think of someone. What do you think...?

$npcName:11000057[gender:1]$... $npc:11000074[gender:0]$'s daughter. <font color="#909090">(She's just the sort of person who would have a jewel like the one $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ found. But why would she be so careless as to leave it behind?)</font>
<font color="#909090">(She may have left it as a message for $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$. If that's the case, then he's walking into a trap...)</font>
Who else knows that $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ is working with the forces of darkness? Does the empress even know?

$npcName:11000074[gender:0]$ tried to keep it a secret, but news travels quickly among nobles. The empress, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$, even $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$... They all know. And $npcName:11000057[gender:1]$ is using that knowledge as a weapon.

She certainly isn't being subtle. After the incident in $map:02000023$ with $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, she used $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ to grab the attention of both $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and his pursuers.
She's not afraid to make a lot of noise to accomplish her goals. That makes her dangerous.
Both $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ are in great peril.
You can't risk facing her alone. Why don't you go to $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ and ask for help from his people?
You can't risk facing her alone. Why don't you go to $npcName:11000006[gender:0]$ and ask for help from his people?
You're $MyPCName$, right? Here to see the boss?
You just missed him.
Where was he headed?
Beats me! We were getting ready for a mission when he stepped out. $npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ is in charge of our supply lines—he might know something.
We were getting ready for a mission when he stepped out. $npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ is in charge of our supply lines—he might know something.
Hey, I'm busy!
The boss went to Katramus. We didn't know the exact location, so we had to get a search party together.
It took time to pull everyone together, but I think we've got a shot here. Anyway, you want me to take a message to the boss?
I need to meet him in person.
Then you should go to Katramus. They should have found the entrance by now, so you better hurry.
You should go to Katramus. They should have found the entrance by now, so you better hurry.
I'm not convinced you're on my side, but I doubt that matters to the people you freed.
Meet me at the hideout and we'll plan our next move. We can sort out our allegiances later.
You've come this far, so help me liberate $dungeonTitle:21017001$.
You've come this far, so help me liberate $dungeonTitle:21017001$.
I think it's safe to say you're no enemy of mine.
Anyway... You helped save my friends. I owe you.
I can start repaying my debt with answers. I'm sure you've got a lot of questions.
How did you find Katramus?
This wasn't Humblis's first time in the Land of Darkness, so it wasn't difficult to find my way to Katramus.
The freedom fighters just happened to be preparing an attack when we got there. Lucky for us, since we needed the reinforcements.
I'm just glad we caught up to $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ before he reached the top of the tower. If we hadn't, he and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ would be goners.
Where is $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$, anyway?
He and $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ are laying low while they recover from the battle. In the meantime, I've got a mission for you.
What's that?
A little while ago, we got a tip from an anonymous source. This person claims that he has evidence about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s operations, but in exchange he wants protection from Dark Wind.
Some of my agents could use your help. It's time we finally nail Dark Wind to the wall.
$npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ will brief you on the details.
$npcName:11000566[gender:0]$ will brief you on the details.
We meet again. Nice to see you.
We got a lead on someone who can expose Dark Wind's wrongdoing near $map:02000279$. $npcName:11000565[gender:0]$ is already there, looking for our informant.
$npcName:11000565[gender:0]$'s the best tracker we've got. Meet up with him at $map:02000279$. I'm sure you'll find our man in no time.
$npcName:11000565[gender:0]$'s the best tracker we've got. Meet up with him at $map:02000279$. I'm sure you'll find our man in no time.
So, you're with Humblis now?
I'm just doing a favor for $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$.
I won't say no to the help. This place is bigger than I expected...
Me and the others are canvasing the area, but it's hard to get anything done with all the psycho robots here. I'm pretty sure they've been locking all the doors, too...
It's easy enough to dismantle them... most of the time. The $npcName:22000042$, on the other hand, is too much for my guys to handle. That mechanical monstrosity has the whole place on lockdown.
If anyone's got a shot of taking the $npcName:22000042$ down, it's you. You send that thing to the scrapyard, and we'll get the doors open.
If anyone's got a shot of taking the $npcName:22000042$ down, it's you. You send that thing to the scrapyard, and we'll get the doors open.
Great. While you took care of our big metal friend, I managed to get the power back on. The doors are open to us.
Now, back to the search. Mind checking out the closed off area behind me?
Now, back to the search. Mind checking out the closed off area behind me?
Um... Wh-who are you?
I'm with Humblis.
D-did $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$ send you? Thank goodness. I'm... I'm going to live!
I was sure $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ would track me down and make me "disappear." Those thugs were his men, I'm sure of it.
Why is he after you?
It's because I know the truth, and I can prove it. My name is $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$, and I am the president of the Barrota Trading Company.
After $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s death, I tried to smuggle myself away from $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, but a pickpocket stole all of my money. I've been living on the streets ever since.
That pickpocket showed up dead days later. I hoped maybe they'd think it was me... but no, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ wouldn't be fooled so easily...
He kept chasing me in secret... and I just about ran out of places to hide. That's why I'm turning myself in to you. I'd rather spend the rest of my life in jail than die on the streets.
What is $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ hiding?
He's a traitor to the throne! He follows Turka, commander of the devils who attacked the city! And he murdered $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ in cold blood.
I'll tell you everything I know. Just don't let him get me!
I'll get the others. Humblis will keep you safe.
Thank you, thank you, thank you! I hid my account book behind the clock in my old office. It has more than enough evidence to put $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ behind bars for life.
I doubt anyone's found it. Get to it before someone does. Then you'll see what I mean about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
I've hidden my account book behind the clock in the $map:02000226$. It has more than enough evidence to put $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ behind bars for life.
Did you find our guy?
(Tell him about $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$.)
That fat cat is a hobo now? I've gotta see this for myself!
Leave $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ to me. You should head to $map:02000139$ and get that evidence. If it's actually there, take it straight to $npc:11000529[gender:0]$ so we can put this behind us!
Leave $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ to me. You should head to $map:02000139$ and get that evidence. If it's actually there, take it straight to $npc:11000529[gender:0]$ so we can put this behind us!
$npcName:11000565[gender:0]$ has already filled me in. You have the evidence?
(Hand over $item:30000075$.)
Unbelievable. Everything $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ said was true!
With $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$'s testimony and these logs... $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is finished. We can finally prove $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s innocence!
$MyPCName$! Go straight to $map:02000152$ and don't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ get away. I won't let him slither out of this one!
$MyPCName$! Go straight to $map:02000152$ and don't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ get away. I won't let him slither out of this one!
Whoa, there. What's the big hurry? Something happen?
Where's $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$?
He mumbled something about urgent business and... just left.
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ looked like he was gonna puke. Never seen him like that before... What's got everyone in such a tizzy?
(Tell him about $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s crimes.)
$npc:11000044[gender:0]$ did all that? No way...
Dang... What's going to happen to us now?
You have the look of a $male:man,female:woman$ with bad news. What happened with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$?
He got away.
No! We were too slow...
Go to $map:02000001$ and show $item:30000075$ to the captain of the guard. I want every soldier in the empire to be on the lookout for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
Why are you back?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000075$.
I forgot what I'm supposed to do.
This is very important! Don't lose it this time.
Surely you weren't so careless as to lose it. Look in your bag again.
Why don't you clear out some space in your bag?
Go to $map:02000001$ and show $item:30000075$ to the captain of the guard. I want every soldier in the empire to be on the look out for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
You've been busy. I hear we have you to thank for $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$'s arrest.
(Hand over $item:30000075$ and explain everything.)
Huh. Isn't that something?
I'll put a bounty out for $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ right away. I have a lot of questions for $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ once we've got him in a nice, secure cell...
The news of your latest exploits has attracted the interest of Her Imperial Majesty. See her right away.
The news of your latest exploits has attracted the interest of Her Imperial Majesty. See her right away.
I hear that the head of Barrota Trading Company has been taken into custody. Is that true?
(Tell her about everything, including $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s return.)
In the end, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ was behind so much suffering and chaos. Where is $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
He's found somewhere safe to lick his wounds.
We'd mistaken our allies for enemies, and our enemies for allies. We must see to it that amends are made.
So, the rumors were true. $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$ really is alive...
I hear he had something to do with $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s death, too. Just thinking about it gives me the shivers. How am I supposed to deliver a letter to a guy like that...?
What letter?
It's a letter from $npcName:11000097[gender:0]$ in $map:02000139$. It seems like he had something to say to his old boss. If you're so curious, why don't you deliver the letter yourself?
You have something to say to me?
I, uhh... misplaced $item:30000341$.
Nope! I just got turned around.
I see. Here's another copy.
Didn't you put it in your bag? Maybe you should double-check.
How can you walk around with a bag that full? You should drop some things first.
It's not that far. Just follow the path along the west side of the castle until you hit the $map:02000310$.
I didn't expect to see you again. You want to question me, too?
(Give him $item:30000341$.)
A letter from $npcName:11000097[gender:0]$... I'm afraid to open it. I failed all of my employees.
Anyway... I'm resigned to my fate. But do you think you could do me one last favor?
Sure.
Before he died, $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ gave me something. A keepsake of sorts. He wanted me to make sure his mother received it in case something... happened... to him.
What's that?

$npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s mother is blind. He used to send her tapes instead of letters so that she could hear her boy's voice anytime she wanted. This is his last recording. Of course, he didn't know that at the time...
I want you to give $item:30000342$ to $npcName:11000178[gender:1]$ in $map:02000076$.
Why'd you come back?
I, uhh... misplaced the $item:30000342$.
Nope! I just got turned around.
Ah... Please be more careful next time. This is $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ dying request, you know.
I put it in your bag. Look again.
You need to clean your bag! Even when I was out on the streets, my bag wasn't this jumbled...
How did you manage to find me if you can't find your way out of here?
Yes, who is it?
(Hand over $item:30000342$.)
Oh, how sweet. My son is always sending me letters. What a nice boy.

A stranger came by my house some time ago and told me that my boy was dead, but I'm no fool. I gave the man a swift boxing around the ears and sent him on his way. I wonder if it was the postman playing a prank, as I stopped receiving letters after that...
I was starting to get a little nervous, truth be told! It's so lovely to get a letter again after so much time.
Would you be a dear and play the tape for me? It can be quite difficult to get around, and I'm eager to hear my son's voice.
Yes?
Give me the $item:30000342$.
Where's the tape player?
Oh, silly me! Did I forget to hand it to back to you? Well, here you are.
I'm quite certain I've already handed it to you...
Let me just... Oh, my. Your bag is much too full!
It should be just by the bed.
It is so lovely to hear my $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s voice again. But he's talking about the empress's big event... Wasn't that a while ago? When did he record this?
It just took a long time to get here.
That poor boy works too hard. You make sure he's eating well, will you?
I heard there's a newcomer at headquarters. You should go meet him!
I heard there's a newcomer at headquarters. You should go meet him!
It's been a while.
I have some good news.
What's that?
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ has signed on with our defense force. After he met with the empress, she asked him to track down $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
It's funny to think that he was one of the empire's most wanted not too long ago. Anyway... $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is eager to see you. He's in the $map:02000228$.
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is eager to see you. He's in the $map:02000228$.
So, we finally meet face-to-face. And neither one of us are trying to arrest the other, even!
It's been a wild ride.
$npcName:11000529[gender:0]$ says you were a big help. It takes a lot to squeeze a compliment out of him.
I'm curious about everything you've been through.
Where do I even start? At first, all I cared about was getting revenge. But I didn't know who killed the captain or why...
Our enemies have been taking out the Seven Heroes one-by-one.
What has $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ gotten himself into? I couldn't believe he'd resort to murder just for a promotion, but it seems he's playing a bigger game...
If we want answers, we need to find $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. Everyone's out looking for him, but you don't get to the top of Dark Wind without learning a trick or two.
The $map:02000146$ isn't the only way to and from the Land of Darkness. There are plenty of tunnels dotting the landscape that also bridge our worlds.
We have to close the net before $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ escapes through one of them. I need your help.
It would be my pleasure.
I'm glad I can count on you. We've already got most of the tunnels covered.

I want you to search the $map:02000308$. I have a feeling that there's a minor gate to the Land of Shadow there. You start at the entrance near the $map:02000145$. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ will start from the other side.
Start at the entrance near the $map:02000145$. $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ will start from the other side.
There you are.
Where's $npc:11000064[gender:0]$?
He spotted someone and chased after them. I tried to keep up, but I'm still recovering from Katramus...
He's in no condition to face $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ by himself. I couldn't stand to lose $npc:11000064[gender:0]$... not again...
Then we'd better hurry up and find them.
Thank you! I'll search around here. You continue on to the $map:52000003$.
I'll search around here. You continue on to the $map:52000003$.
Curses! I was determined to avenge the captain, but... $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ used to be a friend. Even after his betrayal, I hesitated...
You'll get another chance.
I hope you're right. Until then, I won't be able to rest. As he fell into the darkness, I could feel the hatred in his eyes...
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ will return. And he will doubtless be stronger than he is now...
I'd hoped to close this chapter of my life. No matter what, I won't let $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ escape again. For now, we need to let the others know what happened here.
I'd hoped to close this chapter of my life. No matter what, I won't lose to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ again.
So, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ has slipped from our grasp...

I agree with $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s assessment—we haven't seen the last of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. One doesn't simply turn away from such darkness. The empress needs to learn what's happened here.

I agree with $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$'s assessment—we haven't seen the last of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$. One doesn't simply turn away from such darkness. The empress needs to learn what's happened here.
Now... What became of $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$?
(Fill her in on what's happened.)
I'm still in shock that $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ was working with our enemies this whole time. The blood of a hero is on his hands... At least I believe I'm beginning to understand their plan.
Maple World is facing the greatest crisis of this time, and we need new heroes to rise up and stand against it. Heroes like you, $MyPCName$.
I hope you find $npc:11000044[gender:0]$ before he can do even more damage to my people.
Ah, my champion $MyPCName$.
In my capacity as the chief investor of the Frontier Foundation, it is my privilege to bestow you with your first assignment. $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$, please brief $MyPCName$.
Of course, miss.
Now listen carefully, as I won't repeat myself.
As you have already heard, a sequence of extraordinary occurrences has coincided with the discovery of the lapenshards.
The Frontier Foundation believes there to be a connection between the two, and has begun a worldwide investigation.
However, the foundation is still rather new, and finding suitable candidates for such a task is not easy. At this point, we can't afford to refuse any help.
To that end, we would like you to carry out this mission.
Gee, I'm flattered.
The waters beyond Barbosa Beach and Cheliska Bay have grown treacherous.
With high, turbulent seas, and tidal waves threatening passage, sailing has become quite dangerous. And now the phenomenon has spread to the waters of Calibre.
As our allies, and investors in the Foundation, it is crucial we aid the Runeblades of Terrun Calibre in investigating these phenomena.
$npcName:11003884[gender:0]$, as this matter concerns us, why don't you allow us to take it from here?
A splendid idea, miss $npcName:11003885[gender:1]$. This tired old man would be grateful for the assistance.
I appreciate your understanding, $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$. $MyPCName$, please step over here for a moment.
Why are you talking to me? Miss $npcName:11003885[gender:1]$ has requested your presence.
The unexplained ocean phenomena $npcName:11003884[gender:0]$ mentioned are more than just impediments to ocean travel—

Calibre Shore has been buffeted by tsunamis and powerful winds. Some of the smaller surrounding islands have even been swallowed by the sea. But it's becoming more and more clear this is a global problem.
I initially thought all this was caused by the lapenshards themselves, but we've learned that the lapenshards are simply catalysts. They have no real effect without someone to use them.
Excuse me. You realize I was speaking, do you not? Your status as acting Elder Blade does not give you license to interrupt.
Hmph... You're scarier than the raging waves.
<font size='40'>What did you just say?</font>
<font size='30'>Err, <font size='24'>I <font size='22>didn't <font size='18'>say <font size='17'>any<font size='16'>thing...</font>
Ahem. Where was I?
Weird sea-happenings, not good.
Sigh... Thanks to Landevian I've lost my train of thought.
Hey, what're you blaming me for?
...While they're busy arguing, allow me to wrap up this briefing.
After detecting dark energies emanating from the sea, we in Terrun Calibre set out to investigate.
We then discovered an important clue to the mystery at hand.
We received word that $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$</font>, one of Maple World's most famous explorers, claimed to have encountered the "truth" behind the raging seas.
$npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ may prove to be the key to unraveling this mystery. We must learn what he knows.
Where can I find him?
$npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ should be under the care of $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$, manager of the $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$.
Then that's where I'll start my investigation.
$npc:11003080[gender:0]$ is at the $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$. Learn what he knows.
$npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ should be under the care of $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$, manager of the $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$.
What's going on?
I'm here to see $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$. There's something I need to talk with him about.
Hm... I don't know if he's any shape to talk right now. He was the sole survivor of the Majesty, a vessel lost to the raging seas.
Plus, he specifically asked not to be disturbed. The poor guy seemed scared out of his mind. I'm inclined to let him rest.
I tried to get him to tell me what happened on numerous occasions, but every time he just clammed up.
I'm here specifically to investigate the source of the ocean disturbances. I need to speak with $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$.
Sigh... I guess you can try talking to him. The situation at hand is extremely important to us.
There's a bedroom over there. $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s inside.
Thank you.
$npc:11003080[gender:0]$ is inside. I hope this situation gets resolved before more lives are lost.
Ugh... How did you get in here? I specifically told $npc:11000019[gender:0]$ not to let anyone in.
Are you $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$? I came to ask you what you know about the ocean disturbances that sank your ship.
Ugh... I'm done talking about that.
You need to tell me what you know. Lives hang in the balance.
Sigh... There is a divine beast that lives in the deeps. $npc:11003086$. He is the reason the seas rage.
Yes. $npc:11003086$, Guardian of the Seas.
$npc:11003086$ is a living legend. A peaceful being who protects the ocean and guides sailors to safety on their journeys.
The Guardian of the Seas is a legend known to all sailors. It is every sailor's dream to meet him before they die.
But... That is not the $npc:11003086$ I encountered that fateful day. Red eyes glittering beneath waves as tall as mountains...
My childhood dream transformed instantly into a nightmare.... <font color="#909090">(He sobs quietly.)</font>
How do I find $npc:11003086$?
You want to find $npc:11003086$? You're out of your mind! I watched my ship and fellow crewmen get sucked into the deep like toys in a draining bath. And you want to meet the creature that did that?
Unless you can think of some other way to quiet the seas, I don't have a choice.
I don't know if you're brave, desperate, or stupid... Fine, I'll tell you.
I don't know where $npc:11003086$ is, but I know who does. The siren sisters $npc:11003888[gender:1]$ and $npc:11003889[gender:1]$ are friends of $npc:11003086$. They know how to find him.
Then where can I meet these siren sisters?
They were always the ones who'd find me. Whenever I set sail they'd swim alongside my ship and visit for a while. But now that my ship is gone, we've lost touch.
Don't worry I know a personal friend of the siren sisters.
One of my associates is a former pirate named $npc:11003082[gender:0]$. He lives in a small cabin in $map:02000182$. He can point you in the right direction.
Former pirate?
Yes. The life's not for everyone. He wanted to wash his hands of that life and start a new one. I'm sure you'll be able to arrange some sort of trade in exchange for the siren sisters' whereabouts.
And... take this spyglass. The sisters will know I sent you if you show them this.
Thank you for your help. Get well soon.
<font color="#909090">(It looks like you've got to find an ex-pirate in $map:02000182$.)</font>
$npc:11003082[gender:0]$ lives in a small cabin in $map:02000182$. Don't expect his help to come free.
<font color="#909090">(The door to the cabin is closed, but it doesn't appear to be locked.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You should probably knock as a courtesy.)</font>
Hello, $npc:11003082[gender:0]$? Are you home?
N-no! I'm not the person you're looking for! G-get out of my house this instant!
<font color="#909090">(What? But you're not even inside his house...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You should enter the $map:52000096$ and investigate.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Enter the $map:52000096$.)</font>
I really appreciate your help, but what are you doing here?
<font color="#909090">(You tell $npc:11003082[gender:0]$ about your mission.)</font>
I know where to find the siren sisters. But I can't just tell you.
Why not?
Easy. Nothing's free in this world.
I'll tell you where to find your sirens, but there's a price.
I'm not giving you any money.
I don't need money, I need a new life! All you have to do is erase all evidence I was ever a pirate.
I'm sick of the pirate way. All I want is a quiet, honest life.

I want you to get rid of the $npcPlural:21000232[gender:0]$ living on the $map:02000182$ and destroy $item:30001151$ and all its copies—that is, a list of all pirates in the area. Do that, and I'm a free man.
<font color="#909090">(It seems helping $npc:11003082[gender:0]$ is the only way you're going to find the siren sisters.)</font>
I'm sick of the pirate way. All I want is a quiet, honest life.
It's done. There's nothing and no one left to link you to your past life.
Wow... really?
You don't know how much that means! I'm going to live an honest life from now on, I swear.
I haven't forgotten my part of the bargain. You can find the siren sisters in the $map:52100002$ on $map:52100001$.

But reaching them may not be easy. There's a pirate captain by the name of $npc:29000213$ who fancies himself a suitor to $npc:29000212[gender:1]$, the younger one of the siren sisters. Odds are you'll cross paths.
He's been trying to kidnap her for I don't know how long. Her older sister $npc:29000211[gender:1]$ usually manages to drive him off, but his determination is unshakable. They may need your help.
Be careful, will you? Even if you reach the sisters, you may be in for some trouble if they can't tell you from the pirates.
Captain $npc:29000213$ is scary, but the sisters are scarier. Look out for that $npc:29000211[gender:1]$.
Did I hear it right? Did you really beat $npc:29000213$ and the siren sisters in a fight? Amazing!
Beat us? As if! How about you and I go fin to fin right here, right now?
Eek...! No, I'm good!
Don't be so angry, sis. He didn't mean any harm.
Ugh, it's that stupid happy-go-lucky attitude of yours that has pirates chasing you around in the first place!
The rumors are true... $npc:11003888[gender:1]$ is so sweet.
What is this ugly fish talking about?
Hehe...
Oh right, $MyPCName$ was it? Let's talk.
Ugh... $npc:11003888[gender:1]$ is so mean! Not like $npc:11003889[gender:1]$...
Mean? How about my trident and I show you what mean really looks like.
S-save me...
So I came to you because $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ said you could take me to Alvanos.
Oh, $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$! How is he? I haven't seen him recently.
There she goes again! Sigh, I don't know how my little sister fell for that finless vagabond...
(Ask about $npc:11003888[gender:1]$'s relationship with $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$.)
(Ask about $npc:11003086$.)
How do you and $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ know each other?
He's been so many places, it was inevitable our paths would cross. Now whenever I see his ship on the horizon, I swim out to meet him and listen to tales of his journeys.
When I hear the stories of his adventures, I can't help but think about how big and amazing this world is.
That boy is full of hot air.
That's funny, I remember a certain other mermaid sitting and listening to him talk all night.
T-that was just because I was bored and had nothing better to do!
She's just saying that because she's worried about me running off on my own adventures and getting in trouble. Sigh... It's been a while since I've heard from $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$.
(Ask about $npc:11003086$.)
Tell me about $npc:11003086$.
$npc:11003086$ is a divine beast and peaceful guardian of the ocean...
Or at least he was, until the incident...
The incident?
A loud explosion shook the ocean floor. All the whales and the fish who heard it compared it to the crash of a falling star.
After that, a dark energy began to spread across the ocean, corrupting things in its path.
$npc:11003086$ went to the source of the disturbance to discover what happened.
But when he returned, he was different...
That's when $npc:11003086$ started his rampage. One good thing did come of all this though. From what I've heard, the dark, mysterious energies leeching into the oceans had vanished.
I need to speak with $npc:11003086$.
I can take you to $npc:11003086$, but you're not going to make it there by swimming. Not with the seas as rough as they are...
I know how you can get there! Why not steal $npc:29000213$'s ship, $map:52100012$? That thing glides through stormy seas like butter.
You want us to steal the what? From who?
Of course, stealing the $map:52100012$ won't be easy. It's anchored at $map:52100011$, which is brimming with pirates.
Don't worry about it. We'll help commandeer the ship!
Yeah!
This sounds like a crazy idea. Count me in.
You can find $npc:11003086$ in the $map:52100013$!
$npc:11003086$, are you okay?
Ugh... The darkness is receding... What was I doing just now?
What a relief! You're back to your old self!
Are you the ones who restored me to my senses? Thank you.
Somebody had to. But tell me, what happened to you to make you act that way?
It all began when $npc:11003795[gender:0]$ came crashing into the ocean from above.

I sensed that the evil energy trickling from his unconscious body was corrupting the lapenshards that had sprouted in the depths of the ocean. I knew that if nothing was done, this would lead to disaster.
In order to defend my domain, I called upon the powers of the waves and drove the darkness out of the ocean. The seas were pure once more.
But through all this there was something I had not considered...
That my exposure to the darkness would influence me.
I deeply regret the suffering my carelessness has caused.
If it weren't for your intervention, my ocean rampage would have continued unabated. Thank you, human.
$MyPCName$, because of your actions, the ocean is at peace once more. Thank you so much!
You are welcome to return here any time—a privilege I have bestowed on no other human.
Um... $MyPCName$! Before you leave...
What is it?
Please tell $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ that I said hello. And tell him to come visit us once he's fully recovered...
$npcName:11003888[gender:1]$, how could you be attracted to such a weak human?
It's not what you think...
Whatever. Anyways, $MyPCName$, you should come visit us with $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$ some time. It'd be nice to see you.
<font color="#909090">(With Alvanos restored to his senses, the ocean disturbances have ended. Return to the $map:52010068$ and brief everyone on the results of your mission.)</font>
If it weren't for your intervention, my ocean rampage would have continued unabated. Thank you, human.
<font color="#909090">(You tell $npc:11004097[gender:0]$ what happened on your mission, as well as what Alvanos said about the lapenshards.)</font>
That was quite the accomplishment for your first mission. I would expect no less of my champion.
Ahem... It must have been quite a difficult task for you.
I have already taken the liberty of informing the siren sisters of the sailor $npcName:11003080[gender:0]$'s recovery, by way of the former pirate $npcName:11003082[gender:0]$.
<font color="#909090">(The old butler works fast...)</font>
The intelligence provided by Terrun Calibre was very helpful in this mission. Perhaps you should speak with them.
Thank you, director Beatrice.
$MyPCName$, there is something I want to say to you.
Hehe...
Oh! Is something the matter, my kin?
Regarding your mission, I wanted to tell you—
<font color="#909090">(Is something wrong?)</font>
Good work.
A compliment, from Ishura? What a rare sight!
But I admit, you did well. Guess you weren't just sitting on your butt this whole time.
It's been a while. How goes your quest for revenge?
That's none of your business.
Whoa, there's no need to be snippy. I'm not trying to pick a fight.
Shouldn't you hurry on ahead? It seems everyone has gathered.
What about you? Where will you go from here?
My life belongs to the $npc:11003891[gender:0]$. My duty is clear.
You aren't worried about her?
That's none of your business.
How is Eve? Is she doing well?
Yes, it seems so.
I apologize for asking you to check up on her, especially considering your relationship with your own father...
It's fine. If you'll excuse me, I need to report to the $npc:11003894[gender:0]$.
Lapenshards, tainted by darkness? Curious. Yes, I think we've learned all we need about the blackshards.
Hehe... Who could have imagined $npc:11003795[gender:0]$'s fall from grace would have such an interesting effect?
The divine beast's descent into berserk rage was also quite interesting.
The blackshards should prove an amusing toy. Just like the $npc:11003891[gender:0]$'s right-hand man.
The operation to collect Gespenst's lapenshard is proceeding smoothly.
Then preparations are going well?
Yes. Though it brings me no joy to return to the place where I failed once before...
My plan's going great too, thanks for asking!
I'm well on my way to building a forge that can transform lapenshards into blackshards, so you can look forward to that!
The blackshard is one of the weapons necessary to bring Operation Black Moon to fruition. I cannot overstate its importance.
<font size='40'>Failure is not an option.</font>
$npc:11003892[gender:0]$, I'm looking forward to the final test in the El Nath Mountains.
There's no need to worry. I've selected the perfect chess piece.
A man so cold he'd make your own heart seem warm... He's already made his move, hehehe...
Reports indicate that the extreme weather conditions in El Nath are tied to the lapenshards.
Since this was the case beneath the waters of Cheliska Bay, it's reasonable to presume the same must also be true for El Nath.
Of course, I value your own expert assessment. Do you believe lapenshards are involved in the phenomena occurring in El Nath?
I believe so.
I'm not so sure.
Which means that someone or something is using lapenshards as a catalyst to create the extreme weather conditions there.
A savvy analysis, $MyPCName$. I was right to have chosen you as my champion.
Ah, our guest has arrived just in time. The perfect person to assist with our mission to El Nath.
Guest?
$npc:11004018[gender:0]$, weapon merchant of $map:02000001$, at your service!
$npc:11004018[gender:0]$ will aid us in our investigation of El Nath. He also assists the foundation by providing certain materials.
That's right! Come over here and we can discuss the details!
I mean, the extreme weather might just be that, extreme weather. Heatwaves and cold snaps happen in nature, don't they?
Perhaps. No matter the case, an investigation is warranted. The sooner we determine the cause, the sooner we may be able to do something to remedy the situation.
Really now, $MyPCName$... Already trying to shirk your duties to the foundation? Hmph.
What? No, I—
All righty! Who's ready to investigate El Nath?
Who are you?
This is our resident expert in all matters involving El Nath.
$npc:11004018[gender:0]$, weapon merchant of $map:02000001$, at your service! I also procure various odds and ends for the Frontier Foundation.
Come over here and we can discuss the details!
$npc:11004018[gender:0]$ is the one you should be speaking with.
That's right! Talk to me!
As you've already heard, something weird is going on in El Nath and I think I know exactly what's to blame!
What?
The Frozen Crystal—a mysterious jewel that sustains the kingdom of El Nath. I think something's gone wrong with it.
If something is wrong with the Frozen Crystal, that means something's gone wrong with its caretaker, Queen $npc:11004023[gender:0]$.
That's why I need your help, $MyPCName$! From what I've heard about you, I bet you're up to the challenge!
If anyone can set things right in the kingdom of El Nath, it's you!
How do you know so much about El Nath?
That my friend is a question for another time.
Guidance has already been dispatched to the $map:52000080$ in $map:02000261$. You are to take $npc:11004018[gender:0]$ and join them there.
Your next mission is to investigate El Nath alongside the members of Guidance, locate $npc:11004023[gender:0]$, and secure the Frozen Crystal.
Let's head to $map:02000261$!
There's no time to waste! Let's hurry to $map:02000261$!
The foundation director said she'd send someone to help us and it looks she meant you. I'm glad she picked someone capable.
Now, regarding the investigation... Ugh...
Brother, don't push yourself. Your wounds haven't healed yet.
What happened to him?
He was investigating an $map:52000081$ alongside several soldiers when they were attacked by an unidentified swordsman...
$npc:11004021[gender:0]$, that's enough. There's no need to bore $MyPCName$ with the details. It was a trivial matter that occurred due to my own carelessness.
Unfortunately, the ambush has left our scouting party out of commission.
To this end, I'd like you to investigate El Nath in our place.
In $map:02000260$, you will find a $npc:11003061$ of particular interest.
Hiding behind it is the cave where our investigation was interrupted. I want you to pick up where we left off. I've marked the location on your map.
In $map:02000260$, you will find a $npc:11003061$ of particular interest.
Hiding behind it is the cave where our investigation was interrupted. I want you to pick up where we left off. I've marked the location on your map.
<font color="#909090">(You feel a draft coming from behind the tree. This must be the place $npcName:11004020[gender:0]$ spoke of.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The cave $npcName:11004020[gender:0]$ told you about should be just behind this tree.)</font>
(Enter the ice cave.)
So, what did you discover?
I had a run-in with the forces of darkness.
Then there's something here that has their interest. Was there anything else?
I met your swordsman.
And yet you're uninjured. Even against you, I doubt he could have been defeated so easily...
He saved me from an ambush.
What? He saved you?
Then he is an enemy of the forces of darkness after all. He must know something that we don't...
Well, there's little to be done about that. More to the point, were you able to explore what was beyond the cavern? We never made it that far.
There's a narrow valley beyond it, but it was too cold to explore further.
Hmm... Then there is truth to El Nath's legendary cold. It's said that only the citizens of the snow kingdom could... That's it!
The cold must have slowed my wits! The snow kingdom vanished long ago, but some of its citizens now call the empire home. Including your friend $npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ there!
Correct. Now he serves as a supplier of various goods. But before he came to the capital, he lived in the snow kingdom that once stood here. It may be that he knows a way to get past the bitter cold.
$npc:11003060[gender:0]$ was a subject of the kingdom of El Nath?
That's right. Well then, I leave this mission to you and $npc:11003060[gender:0]$. Good luck.
Huh? You need my help? But why?
I'm just a merchant from $map:02000001$ who supplies the foundation. The only reason I was sent over anyone else is that my kind is resistant to the cold...
That's not the only reason, is it?
Err... Well, I do know this. The path you weren't able to traverse leads to the home of an old friend, and the cold that stopped you was conjured by $npc:11003069[gender:1]$...
What aren't you telling me?

I volunteered to tag along for a reason. I was hoping for a chance to see my queen again. But that snowstorm... I wasn't strong enough to get through it. Each snowflake felt like the tears of Queen $npcName:11003069[gender:1]$ grieving the loss of her kingdom and her king, $npcName:11003075[gender:0]$...
Do you really have to find her? If Her Majesty is using this kind of magic to keep outsiders away, then she wants to be alone.
All the more reason for me to go.
What do you mean?
The forces of darkness are here, too. Your queen is in danger.
Then... then there's no other option. Do you promise you'll protect her?
I will, but first I need to get through the blizzard.
$npcName:11003063[gender:0]$... He can help.
You'd need magic to match $npc:11003069[gender:1]$'s power if you wanted to dispel the blizzard. Luckily for us, there's no need for that. I know of a special potion that should do the trick.

Yetis aren't usually good with potions. Our sense of smell is too poor to find herbs, you see. But $npcName:11003063[gender:0]$ is special. He can find herbs by feeling around with his skinny little fingers, and use them to make all kinds of medicine.
Where can I find him?
$map:02000263$. He's a little guy, so he's easy to miss. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.
$map:02000263$. He's a little guy, so he's easy to miss. Ask him to make you a bottle of $item:20000451$.
Too cold to talk. Shoo.
I need a bottle of $item:20000451$.
Wh-what? Who're you? Why do you want it? Do you even know what you're asking?
I need to get through $npc:11003069[gender:1]$'s blizzard and make sure she's okay.
$npcName:11003060[gender:0]$ sent you, didn't he? Always sniveling about queen this and royal duty that.
Is it wrong for him to be worried?
He's worrying over nothing! Stubborn oaf...

Sure, she was a fine queen, when times were good. But it all fell apart overnight! The kingdom vanished, and the king and queen with it. The cold wasn't the worst part... The worst part is how we all scattered.
So she wants to hole herself up and mope, when we're the ones who suffered because of her? Fine by me! I'll be happy if I never see her again!
I'm not asking you to see her. I just need your help.
Not interested! That potion is a pain in the tush to make. It's hard to get the ingredients.
$npcName:11003069[gender:1]$'s blizzard is a threat to all of Maple World.
